original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /

original: mthe chung gnyis lcags sgrog tu sbrel nas /

analyzed: de nyid khar gzhag pa ni rdo rje rig pa mchog gi'o //

analyzed: de nyid snying gar lcags kyus 'dren pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //

original: khro bo ske rags kyi'o //
analyzed: khro bo ske rags kyi'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu phrag pa g-yas su gzhag pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis padma'i 'dab ma ltar byas pa ni rdo rje sde'i'o //

analyzed: de nyid myur du bskor nas khar bskyod pa ni rdo rje shugs kyi'o //

analyzed: sngags pas mnyam par gzhag pa yis //
translated: The mantrin, equipoised,

analyzed: ku sha la ni sngags bzlas te /

analyzed: de yang de nas bzhag byas nas //

analyzed: dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'grub //

analyzed: de me thab kyi dbus su gzhag pa 'di me lha'i @305b gzugs byas la /

analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad nas srung ba byas te /

analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la /

original: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /

translated: Alternatively, if it is single-pointed, it is auspicious.

original: rtse mo gnyis la 'bring du 'gyur //
analyzed: rtse mo gnyis la 'bring du 'gyur //
translated: If it has two points, it is middling.

original: rtse mo gsum la tha ma ru //
analyzed: rtse mo gsum la tha ma ru //
translated: If it has three points, it is inferior.

original: sgrub pas mdor bsdus shes par bya //
analyzed: sgrub pas mdor bsdus shes par bya //
translated: The adept should know this in brief.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu dang / mda' la sogs pa yang lha thams cad kyi phyag mtshan yin pas dngos grub kyi rtags su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu dang / mda' la sogs pa yang lha thams cad kyi phyag mtshan yin pas dngos grub kyi rtags su 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, the vajra hook, arrow, and so forth are the hand implements of all the deities, so they are signs of spiritual powers.🔽Smoke swirling and sparks flying,🔽rising with the feet, blazing weakly,

original: du ba 'tshub cing me stag 'phro ba dang // rkang pas ldang zhing 'bar ba zhan pa dang // myur bar chad cing gzi brjid med pa'i 'od //
analyzed: du ba 'tshub cing me stag 'phro ba dang // rkang pas ldang zhing 'bar ba zhan pa dang // myur bar chad cing gzi brjid med pa'i 'od //
translated: quickly interrupted, with light lacking brilliance,🔽rough and dark in color, the color of flesh,🔽like a spear or a needle,🔽and likewise like an elephant's head,

original: rtsub cing mdog gnag pa la sha yi mdog / mdung dang zhib ma 'dra ba dang // de bzhin ba glang mgo 'dra dang // mi ro'i dri dang nya yi dri //
analyzed: rtsub cing mdog gnag pa la sha yi mdog / mdung dang zhib ma 'dra ba dang // de bzhin ba glang mgo 'dra dang // mi ro'i dri dang nya yi dri //
translated: the smell of a human corpse or the smell of fish,

original: yang na bong bu'i sgrar gyur pa //
analyzed: yang na bong bu'i sgrar gyur pa //
translated: or else the sound of a donkey,🔽tormented by blazing cremation fire,

original: sreg mkhan 'bar bas gdungs pa dang // myur du zhi ba'i rnam pa dang // ma rungs 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: sreg mkhan 'bar bas gdungs pa dang // myur du zhi ba'i rnam pa dang // ma rungs 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs //
translated: quickly pacified, with a frightening form,

original: me ni bgegs dang bcas pa yin //
analyzed: me ni bgegs dang bcas pa yin //
translated: the fire is accompanied by obstacles.

original: de ltar bgegs dang bcas pa shes par byas la /
analyzed: de ltar bgegs dang bcas pa shes par byas la /
translated: Having understood that the fire is accompanied by obstacles in this way,

original: snga ma bzhin du bsang gtor byas la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du bsang gtor byas la /
translated: perform the burnt offering as before.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang / sngags kyis sbyangs nas srung bas yongs su bskyad bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang / sngags kyis sbyangs nas srung bas yongs su bskyad bar bya'o //
translated: Having purified with the Vajrayakṣa mudra and mantra, one should protect with the protection.

original: aom badzra yaksha krodha kha da kha da h'um phat ces bya bas mar gyi dgang gzar bdun blugs par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra yaksha krodha kha da kha da h'um phat ces bya bas mar gyi dgang gzar bdun blugs par bya'o //
translated: With the mantra Oṃ vajra-yakṣa krodha kha kha khāhi khāhi hūṃ phaṭ, one should offer seven ladings of clarified butter.

original: de nas lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse mo rang gi mthe bos mnan la phyag rgya 'di dang me lha rang gi sngags brjod cing rdo rje gnod sbyin yang yongs su bzlas pa'i chus lag pas lan gsum gyi bar du 'thor 'thung bya'o //
analyzed: de nas lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse mo rang gi mthe bos mnan la phyag rgya 'di dang me lha rang gi sngags brjod cing rdo rje gnod sbyin yang yongs su bzlas pa'i chus lag pas lan gsum gyi bar du 'thor 'thung bya'o //
translated: Then, pressing the tip of the right forefinger with the thumb, one should offer water for sipping with this mudra and the deity’s mantra, and also with the Vajrayakṣa mantra, sprinkling with the hand three times.

original: snga ma bzhin du bsang gtor byas la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du bsang gtor byas la /
translated: Having sprinkled as before,

original: lce la yi ge h'um bkod de /
analyzed: lce la yi ge h'um bkod de /
translated: one should place the syllable hūṃ on the tongue,

original: dgang blugs gsum mam bdun bya'o //
analyzed: dgang blugs gsum mam bdun bya'o //
translated: and offer three or seven ladings of clarified butter.

original: cung zad zhal gdangs pa la zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: cung zad zhal gdangs pa la zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: For the pacifying rite, one should offer to the slightly opened mouth.

original: de bzhin du dbang gi las dang / rgyas pa dang / dgug pa dang / drag po nyid la ni shin tu zhal gdangs par me'i rang gi sngags kyis dbul bar bya zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang gi las dang / rgyas pa dang / dgug pa dang / drag po nyid la ni shin tu zhal gdangs par me'i rang gi sngags kyis dbul bar bya zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, for the action of subjugation, and for prosperity, attraction, and violence, one should offer with the mantra of one's own fire, with a very open mouth.

original: zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad zhal du dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad zhal du dbul bar bya'o //
translated: All the substances for the oblation should be offered into the mouth.

original: yam shing rnams dang de bzhin du mi rus kyi phye ma la sogs pa rnams ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: yam shing rnams dang de bzhin du mi rus kyi phye ma la sogs pa rnams ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The fire-sticks and likewise the bone-powder, etc. are [offered] into the circle of light.

original: zho dang @307b bza' ba la sogs pa ni phyag tu'o //
analyzed: zho dang @307b bza' ba la sogs pa ni phyag tu'o //
translated: Curds, food, etc. are [offered] into the hand.

original: me tog ni dbu la'o //🔽dri chab ni thugs la'o //
analyzed: me tog ni dbu la'o // dri chab ni thugs la'o //
translated: Flowers are [offered] into the head.🔽Perfume is [offered] into the heart.

original: bdug pa ni sna la'o //
analyzed: bdug pa ni sna la'o //
translated: Incense is [offered] into the nose.

original: de ltar dgang blugs byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar dgang blugs byas nas /
translated: Having thus performed the pouring and the sprinkling,

original: rdzas thams cad so sor lan gsum gsum dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdzas thams cad so sor lan gsum gsum dbul bar bya'o //
translated: one should offer each of the substances three times.

original: rim pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: rim pa 'di yin te /
translated: This is the sequence:

original: 'bar ba'i me la yam shing ste //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i me la yam shing ste //
translated: To the blazing fire, the fire-sticks,

original: de nas mar dang de 'og til//
analyzed: de nas mar dang de 'og til//
translated: then the ghee, then the sesame,

original: de 'og zho dang 'bras chan sogs //
analyzed: de 'og zho dang 'bras chan sogs //
translated: then the curds, the boiled rice, etc.

original: cho ga 'dis ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga 'dis ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
translated: This is the brief rite.

original: de nas 'thor 'thung dang bsang gtor byas la /
analyzed: de nas 'thor 'thung dang bsang gtor byas la /
translated: Then, having performed the sprinkling and the fumigation,

original: me lha 'bar ba'i gzugs can zhu bar gyur pa'am /
analyzed: me lha 'bar ba'i gzugs can zhu bar gyur pa'am /
translated: the fire god melts into the blazing form.

original: yang na shar lho'i mtshams su'am /
analyzed: yang na shar lho'i mtshams su'am /
translated: Or else, he is placed in the southeast corner,

original: yang na khyams la rang gi gzugs kyis gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na khyams la rang gi gzugs kyis gzhag par bya'o //
translated: or else, in the courtyard, in his own form.

original: de nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas la bzhugs pa'i me'i dbus su lha'i gdan bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas la bzhugs pa'i me'i dbus su lha'i gdan bsam par bya'o //
translated: Then, in the middle of the fire, which is in the place that is suitable for the rite of pacification, etc., one should imagine the seat of the deity.

original: de la zhi ba la ni yi ge aom las padma dkar po bskyed la /
analyzed: de la zhi ba la ni yi ge aom las padma dkar po bskyed la /
translated: In the case of pacification, one should generate a white lotus from the syllable OM,

original: de'i steng du rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings pa badzra dh'a tu sv'a h'a zhes bya bas bsam par bya'o ;
analyzed: de'i steng du rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings pa badzra dh'a tu sv'a h'a zhes bya bas bsam par bya'o ;
translated: and on top of that, one should imagine Vairocana, white in color, with the mudra of supreme enlightenment, with the mantra vajra-dhātu svāhā.

original: / de nas bsdu ba byas la /
analyzed: / de nas bsdu ba byas la /
translated: Then, having performed the gathering,

original: phyi rol du mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
analyzed: phyi rol du mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
translated: one should praise with the one hundred and eight names.

original: dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la /
analyzed: dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la /
translated: Having summoned, caused to enter, bound, and controlled,

original: ji ltar bris pa de bzhin du bsams la /
analyzed: ji ltar bris pa de bzhin du bsams la /
translated: one should imagine it just as it is drawn.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa dang / rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la /
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa dang / rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la /
translated: One should ward off obstructors with Vajra-Yaka, and so forth, and lock the doors with Vajra-Fist.

original: rdo rje go chas srung ba rnams yang dag par bsrungs la mchod yon phul nas /
analyzed: rdo rje go chas srung ba rnams yang dag par bsrungs la mchod yon phul nas /
translated: One should protect with Vajra-Armor, and offer a welcoming drink.

original: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la /
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la /
translated: One should seal with the four seals.

original: dbang bskur te me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur te me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should worship with the five offerings of flowers, and so forth, and the eight offerings of lovely goddesses, and so forth.

original: de nas phyag rgya bzhi byas la bcom ldan 'das la mchod yon dang 'thor 'thung dang / bsang gtor byas te cho ga rnams rjes su spyad nas /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya bzhi byas la bcom ldan 'das la mchod yon dang 'thor 'thung dang / bsang gtor byas te cho ga rnams rjes su spyad nas /
translated: Then, having performed the four seals, one should offer a welcoming drink, water for the feet, and a sprinkling of water to the Blessed One, and having performed the rites,

original: de'i ljags la yi ge h'um bsams nas mar gyi dgang blugs gsum mam bdun dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ljags la yi ge h'um bsams nas mar gyi dgang blugs gsum mam bdun dbul bar bya'o //
translated: one should imagine the syllable hum on his tongue and offer three or seven ladlefuls of clarified butter.

original: zhi ba'i las la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhi ba'i las la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gzung bar bya'o //
translated: For the rite of pacification, one should hold the ladle and the spoon with the supreme enlightenment seal.

original: de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du rjes su mthun pa'i rdzas thams cad re re zhing yang lan gsum gyi bar du dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du rjes su mthun pa'i rdzas thams cad re re zhing yang lan gsum gyi bar du dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Then, as explained before, offer each of the substances in accordance with the rite three times.

original: dgang gzar gyis gzung du 'dod pa'i rdzas kyi khyad par de dag ni dgang gzar gyis dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: dgang gzar gyis gzung du 'dod pa'i rdzas kyi khyad par de dag ni dgang gzar gyis dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Those special substances to be held in the ladle should be offered with the ladle.

original: yam shing ni lag pas dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: yam shing ni lag pas dbul bar bya'o //
translated: The kindling wood should be offered with the hand.

original: de nas dgang gzar gyis til gyi sbyin sreg @308a * //
analyzed: de nas dgang gzar gyis til gyi sbyin sreg @308a * //
translated: Then, with the ladle, offer sesame seeds

original: gis sdig pa bsreg par bya'o //
analyzed: gis sdig pa bsreg par bya'o //
translated: in the fire to burn up the sin.

original: de la 'di ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi snying po yin te /
analyzed: de la 'di ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi snying po yin te /
translated: The essence of the fire offering for pacifying is this:

original: aom sarbba p'a pam da ha na badzra ya che ge mo p'a pam nir da ha na sr'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sarbba p'a pam da ha na badzra ya che ge mo p'a pam nir da ha na sr'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ, burn up all sins, burn up such and such a person’s sins, svāhā.

original: de ltar sbyin sreg byas pa'i mthar /
analyzed: de ltar sbyin sreg byas pa'i mthar /
translated: At the end of the fire offering,

original: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta mushti bam zhes bya ba rigs kyi snying po brjod nas /
analyzed: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta mushti bam zhes bya ba rigs kyi snying po brjod nas /
translated: say the essence of the family, “Oṃ, all tathāgatas, I pay homage to the fist,”

original: lan gsum gyi bar du mar gyi dgang blugs kyis me spar la yi ge h'um bzlas te /
analyzed: lan gsum gyi bar du mar gyi dgang blugs kyis me spar la yi ge h'um bzlas te /
translated: and light the fire with the ghee oblation three times, reciting the syllable hūṃ.

original: mchod yon phul nas /
analyzed: mchod yon phul nas /
translated: Having offered the libation,

original: de nas 'thor 'thung dang bsang gtor byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
analyzed: de nas 'thor 'thung dang bsang gtor byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
translated: Then, having performed the sprinkling and the burning offering, one should praise with the one hundred and eight names.

original: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Having made offerings with all the offerings,

original: phyag byas te mchod yon phul nas /
analyzed: phyag byas te mchod yon phul nas /
translated: having made obeisance and offered the welcoming drink,

original: mngon par 'dod pa dngos grub kyi phyir ;
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa dngos grub kyi phyir ;
translated: for the sake of the desired spiritual powers,

original: gsol ba btab la phyag rgya dgrol bar 'dod na /
analyzed: gsol ba btab la phyag rgya dgrol bar 'dod na /
translated: having made the supplication, if one wishes to release the seal,

original: badzra sa tva badzra sa tva zhes yang dang yang bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: badzra sa tva badzra sa tva zhes yang dang yang bzla bar bya'o //
translated: one should recite “vajrasattva vajrasattva” again and again.

original: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
analyzed: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
translated: “Oṃ, you have accomplished all the aims of sentient beings,

original: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
translated: please grant the appropriate spiritual powers.

original: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
translated: Having gone to the land of the Buddha,

original: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //🔽zhes gsol ba btab nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol // zhes gsol ba btab nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: please come again.🔽Having made this supplication, one should form the mudra of Vajrasattva,

original: gyen du bkrol la badzra sa tva mu: zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gyen du bkrol la badzra sa tva mu: zhes bya'o //
translated: raise it up, and recite “vajrasattva muḥ.”

original: de ltar rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du'am /
analyzed: de ltar rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du'am /
translated: In this way, in the maṇḍala that is the abode of the victors,

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul du sgrub pa po mngon par 'dod pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul du sgrub pa po mngon par 'dod pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
translated: The practitioner should request the Blessed One to depart by the power of his desire to go to the Buddha's realm.

original: slar yang me lha'i sbyor bas me tog gis /
analyzed: slar yang me lha'i sbyor bas me tog gis /
translated: Again, with the fire ritual, with flowers

original: de'i sngags dang ldan pas thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol la /
analyzed: de'i sngags dang ldan pas thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol la /
translated: and his mantra, he should request him to remain in the middle of the hearth.

original: bsang gtor dang 'thor 'thung byas nas /
analyzed: bsang gtor dang 'thor 'thung byas nas /
translated: Having performed the sprinkling and the libation,

original: sbyin sreg gi rdzas lhag ma rnams kyi sbyin sreg gis tshim par byas la /🔽dgang blugs dang 'thor 'thung phul la /
analyzed: sbyin sreg gi rdzas lhag ma rnams kyi sbyin sreg gis tshim par byas la / dgang blugs dang 'thor 'thung phul la /
translated: he should satisfy him with the remainder of the burnt offerings.🔽Having offered the ladle and the libation,

original: bsang gtor byas nas mchod pa dang / mchod yon phul te /
analyzed: bsang gtor byas nas mchod pa dang / mchod yon phul te /
translated: having performed the sprinkling and the worship, and having offered the water for refreshing the mouth,

original: mngon bar 'dod pa'i dngos grub des blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mngon bar 'dod pa'i dngos grub des blang bar bya'o //
translated: he should take the desired spiritual power.

original: de nas badzra sa tva zhes snga ma'i bzlas pa byas la /
analyzed: de nas badzra sa tva zhes snga ma'i bzlas pa byas la /
translated: Then, with the recitation of vajra-sattva,

original: phyag rgya dgrol ba la sogs pa byas nas /
analyzed: phyag rgya dgrol ba la sogs pa byas nas /
translated: he should perform the unbinding of the seal, and so forth.

original: snga ma bzhin du gshegs pa'i phyir bskul te /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du gshegs pa'i phyir bskul te /
translated: Having requested him to depart as before,

original: badzra h'um mu: zhes bya bas spyi bor bkrol la gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: badzra h'um mu: zhes bya bas spyi bor bkrol la gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
translated: he should request him to depart with vajra-hum-mum, unbinding him on his crown.

original: de nas rang gi lha ji lta ba bzhin du mchod nas snga ma bzhin du gshegs su gsol nas ldang bar bya'o //🔽de ltar nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: de nas rang gi lha ji lta ba bzhin du mchod nas snga ma bzhin du gshegs su gsol nas ldang bar bya'o // de ltar nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor ba'am /
translated: Then, having worshipped one's deity as before, one should request him to depart and rise.

original: thun gsum gyi sbyor bas rtag tu bya'o //
analyzed: thun gsum gyi sbyor bas rtag tu bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should always perform this rite in four sessions or three sessions, every day.

original: ji ltar zhi bas rang dang gzhan la byed pa de bzhin du 'dir yang /
analyzed: ji ltar zhi bas rang dang gzhan la byed pa de bzhin du 'dir yang /
translated: Just as one acts for oneself and others through peace, so here also🔽one should light the fire with red sticks

original: yam shing @308b dmar po rnams kyis me //🔽rab sbar rdo rje khro bo yi //
analyzed: yam shing @308b dmar po rnams kyis me // rab sbar rdo rje khro bo yi //
translated: and,

original: mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms zhugs la //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms zhugs la //
translated: having entered into union with the Vajra Wrathful One in meditative concentration,

original: til bsregs pas ni sdig sregs shig / ces bya'o //
analyzed: til bsregs pas ni sdig sregs shig / ces bya'o //
translated: one should burn the sins with burnt offerings of sesame.

original: rgyas pa la yang bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan rnam par snang mdzad bzhin du thab khung gi dbus su bsgoms la /
analyzed: rgyas pa la yang bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan rnam par snang mdzad bzhin du thab khung gi dbus su bsgoms la /
translated: In the case of enrichment, one should visualize the Blessed One Ratnasaṃbhava in the middle of the hearth as Vairocana, and

original: nor bu'i khu tshur gyis 'bras kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: nor bu'i khu tshur gyis 'bras kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: one should perform the burnt offering of rice with the jewel fist.

original: aom badzra pushta ye che ge mo pushtim ku ru sv'a h'a zhes bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra pushta ye che ge mo pushtim ku ru sv'a h'a zhes bya'o //
translated: The mantra is: Oṃ vajra-puṣṭaye, so-and-so, perform enrichment, svāhā.

original: de ltar rim pa 'dis /
analyzed: de ltar rim pa 'dis /
translated: Thus, with this procedure,

original: yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni //
analyzed: yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni //
translated: one should perform the burnt offering with those very sticks

original: me ni rab tu spar nas kyang //
analyzed: me ni rab tu spar nas kyang //
translated: Having kindled the fire well,

original: rtag tu 'bras ni bsreg byas na //
analyzed: rtag tu 'bras ni bsreg byas na //
translated: and always burning the oblation,

original: gdon mi za bar khyim rgyas 'gyur //

original: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //🔽zhes bya ba ni /🔽rdo rje sgeg mo'i gnas nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan // zhes bya ba ni / rdo rje sgeg mo'i gnas nas brtsams nas /

analyzed: khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa de dag gi las kyi phyag rgya'o //

analyzed: thams cad 'grub byed dag pa ste //

analyzed: rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis so // zhas bya ba ni /

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa ji skad bshad pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa des las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag thams cad kyis dngos grub thams cad byed do //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa ji skad bshad pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa des las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag thams cad kyis dngos grub thams cad byed do //
translated: The one who desires the powers as previously explained, from Vairochana up to Vajra Āveśa, should accomplish all powers by means of all these action seals.

original: dag pa ni kun du lam ngan pa spangs pa'o //
analyzed: dag pa ni kun du lam ngan pa spangs pa'o //
translated: Pure means abandoning all bad paths.

original: rdo rje las ni gar gyi sbyor ba las byung ba'i gar ni de dag gi yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje las ni gar gyi sbyor ba las byung ba'i gar ni de dag gi yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa rdzogs so /

analyzed: // / de ltar rgyas pa la dga' ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: Thus, in order to care for those beings who delight in the extensive,

analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / gzungs dang / chos dang las kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bstan nas /
translated: the great maṇḍala of the Trilokavijaya, the dhāraṇī, Dharma, and action maṇḍalas have been explained.

analyzed: da ni bar ma la dga' ba'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to care for those beings who delight in the middling,

analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bur gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsdus par gyur pa /
translated: the maṇḍala of the Trilokavijaya, which is the collection of all the siddhis taught in the Trilokavijaya section,

original: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ni /
translated: the maṇḍala of the four seals,🔽is explained.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: “Now” means immediately after,

analyzed: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //

analyzed: de la dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyid ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du gsungs pa nyid gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The first, the concentration of application itself, should be understood as taught in the Maṇḍala of Action for Triumph over the Three Worlds.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The Blessed One is Vairocana.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pas na /🔽yang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pas na / yang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Again refers to the Maṇḍala of Action for Triumph over the Three Worlds.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la ltos pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyis /

translated: Again is mentioned in order to refer to the Maṇḍala of the Four Seals of the Blessed One Vairocana, the pledge of the vajra of all tathāgatas, in relation to the Maṇḍala of Action for Triumph over the Three Worlds.

original: @313b sems can gyi khams la rgyas 'debs pas na phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: @313b sems can gyi khams la rgyas 'debs pas na phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal is a seal because it seals the realm of sentient beings.

original: de'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i brtan par gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa ming de skad ces bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i brtan par gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa ming de skad ces bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
translated: That samādhi, which is stabilized by the power of that [mantra], is called by that name. He entered into and actualized it.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba blo la gnas pa'i rang gi rig pa dam pa gsungs pa de 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba blo la gnas pa'i rang gi rig pa dam pa gsungs pa de 'chad pa'o //
translated: Here refers to the explanation of the supreme self-awareness abiding in the mind that will be spoken of. That is explained.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa la brtan par byed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa la brtan par byed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas /
translated: Having emanated the maṇḍala of the four seals of Trilokavijaya and stabilized it,

original: rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: he spoke this supreme awareness.

original: des dkyil 'khor bskyed pa brtan pa'i rgyur gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des dkyil 'khor bskyed pa brtan pa'i rgyur gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it became the cause for stabilizing the generation of the maṇḍala.

original: de ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / rin chen h'um mdzad dang / chos kyi h'um mdzad dang / las kyi h'um mdzad rnams kyi rang gi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du sprul pas brtan par byas pa la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / rin chen h'um mdzad dang / chos kyi h'um mdzad dang / las kyi h'um mdzad rnams kyi rang gi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du sprul pas brtan par byas pa la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand that Vajra Humkara, Jewel Humkara, Dharma Humkara, and Karma Humkara emanate the mandala of the four seals, just as before, and stabilize it.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po lngas so sor rig pa gsungs nas gcig tu gyur nas bskyed pa yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po lngas so sor rig pa gsungs nas gcig tu gyur nas bskyed pa yin no //
translated: The five lords of the mandala, having taught the three knowledges, become one and generate the mandala.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir /
translated: Just as the four seals of the Tathagata emanate the mandala,

original: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed par 'dod pas kyang 'og min du mngon par byang chub nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa lnga dang bcas pa ste ;
analyzed: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed par 'dod pas kyang 'og min du mngon par byang chub nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa lnga dang bcas pa ste ;
translated: so too, one who wishes to generate the yoga of the first stage in order to emanate the mandala of the four seals of the Tathagata, having manifested enlightenment in Akanishtha, together with the five Tathagatas,

original: ji skad bshad pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs mar byon pa yin gyi gcig pu byon pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs mar byon pa yin gyi gcig pu byon pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they come to the palace made of the vajra and jewel, the peak as explained above, and not because they come as individuals.

original: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir yang bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir yang bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In this mandala of the four seals of the vajra family, one should meditate on Vajrahūṃkāra and so forth, which are the causes of generation.

original: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa sprul cing bskyed pa'i phyir ye shes bzhi'i bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi h'um mdzad rnams dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa sprul cing bskyed pa'i phyir ye shes bzhi'i bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi h'um mdzad rnams dgod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to emanate and generate the four seals of the tathāgatas, one should arrange Vajrahūṃkāra, who is the nature of the four intuitions, and also Ratnahūṃkāra, Dharmahūṃkāra, and Karmahūṃkāra.

original: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa lnga pa thams cad sprul par bshad pas /
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa lnga pa thams cad sprul par bshad pas /
translated: Since it is explained that all five types of mandalas of the four seals are emanated,

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa thams cad du yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa thams cad du yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: all emanations of the mandalas of the four seals of Vajrahūṃkāra and so forth should be seen.

original: dper na rnam par snang mdzad kyi rig pa gsungs nas thams cad gcig tu gyur te /
analyzed: dper na rnam par snang mdzad kyi rig pa gsungs nas thams cad gcig tu gyur te /
translated: For example, after the knowledge of Vairochana is taught, everything becomes one,🔽and the mandala of Vairochana is generated.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa de bzhin du las kyi h'um mdzad kyi rig pa gsungs nas /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa de bzhin du las kyi h'um mdzad kyi rig pa gsungs nas /
translated: Similarly, after the knowledge of Karma Hum is taught,

original: @314a * // thams cad gcig tu gyur te /
analyzed: @314a * // thams cad gcig tu gyur te /
translated: everything becomes one,🔽and the mandala of the four seals is generated.

original: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
translated: This is how it goes.

original: gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni /
analyzed: gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni /
translated: By this much of the text,

analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga po gsungs pa yin no //

original: de nas bsdu ba bya ba nas brtsams pa ni /
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba bya ba nas brtsams pa ni /
translated: Then, starting from the dissolution,

analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga po shes par bya'o //
translated: the five samadhis called the King of the Supreme Four-Seal Mandala Ritual should be known.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The powers taught in the Vajravidāraṇa are for the sake of accomplishing the attainment of the pledge and initiation in the maṇḍala of the four seals of Vajravidāraṇa.

analyzed: de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs so //

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs te /

analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ston pa zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //
translated: Again means in relation to the karma maṇḍala.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: Then means immediately after.

analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi bsgom pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pa de'i rjes thogs la phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: After practicing the conduct of meditating on the four seals, the maṇḍala of the four seals should be drawn.

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rgyu de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don ston to //

translated: Because if there is no desire for the mandala of the four seals, then there is no acceptance of sentient beings who delight in the middling. Therefore, the mandala of the four seals is explained.

original: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
translated: Since it is similar to the vajra realm,

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra'o //

original: rdo rje khro bo zhes su bshad //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo zhes su bshad //

original: ces bya ba ni de bshad zin to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni de bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
translated: In the manner of the great mandala,

analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di thams cad kyi thig kyang btab la /

analyzed: nye ba'i khyams spangs pa'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
translated: One should draw it like the great maṇḍala of the Three Worlds Vanquished, abandoning the nearby courtyard.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du //
translated: In all directions of the Buddha

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor @314b dum dung rtse gsum pa'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba la sogs pa gang la yod pa de ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rin po che
translated: means that the maṇḍala of the Dhāraṇī of the Three Worlds Vanquished has a blazing five-pronged vajra on top of a triple-pronged white spear, and so on.

original: dang / chos dang las kyi h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dang / chos dang las kyi h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mudrā of the Three Worlds Vanquished, such as the jewel, dharma, and karma hūṃkāra, and so on,

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod nas gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod nas gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Saying Oṃ sarva tathāgata vajra samaya hūṃ, one should place them.
