translated: In the place of Vajrahūṃkāra, on an elephant seat, on a moon maṇḍala, from jhiṃ, there is a five-pronged vajra blazing on a three-pointed spear.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rta'i gdan gyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i steng du yi ge dzhi las yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa /
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rta'i gdan gyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i steng du yi ge dzhi las yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa /
translated: In the place of Ratnasaṃbhava, on a horse seat, on a moon maṇḍala, on an eight-spoked wheel, from jhiṃ, there is a wish-fulfilling jewel marked with a five-pronged vajra at the top.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rma bya'i gdan gyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rma bya'i gdan gyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
translated: In the place of Amitābha, on a peacock seat, on a moon maṇḍala, there is an eight-petaled lotus.

original: de'i steng du yi ge dhi las padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa rdo rjes mtshan pa /
analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge dhi las padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa rdo rjes mtshan pa /
translated: On that, from dhiṃ, there is a sixteen-petaled lotus marked with a vajra.

original: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su mkha' lding gi gdan gyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brgya byin gyi rdo rje rtse gsum pa /
analyzed: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su mkha' lding gi gdan gyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brgya byin gyi rdo rje rtse gsum pa /
translated: In the place of Amoghasiddhi, on a seat of Garuḍa, on a moon disk, one should draw Indra’s three-pointed vajra.

original: de'i steng du yi ge hr'i:las sna tshogs rdo rje la sna tshogs rdo rje phra mos yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge hr'i:las sna tshogs rdo rje la sna tshogs rdo rje phra mos yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
translated: On top of that, from the syllable hriḥ, one should draw a crossed vajra surrounded by small crossed vajras.

original: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor bas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rjes su spyad la ji lta ba bzhin bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor bas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rjes su spyad la ji lta ba bzhin bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Then, with the application of the procedure of the maṇḍala of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds, one should perform the rite of the master’s acts and collect as before.

original: de nas mtshan brgyad pas bstod pa byas la /
analyzed: de nas mtshan brgyad pas bstod pa byas la /
translated: Then, having praised with the eight names,

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor 'dir yang dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis spyan drangs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor 'dir yang dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis spyan drangs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
translated: in this maṇḍala also, one should perform the extensive rite of invocation and so forth according to the method of the great maṇḍala.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
translated: The word “then” means immediately after.

original: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya'o //
translated: Having performed all the rites, after the praise with the one hundred and eight names,

original: ji ltar 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las /🔽khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dgug par bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang dgug pa dang / zhags pas gzhug pa dang / lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang / khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du byas te /
analyzed: ji ltar 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las / khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dgug par bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang dgug pa dang / zhags pas gzhug pa dang / lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang / khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du byas te /
translated: just as it is explained in the great maṇḍala of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds,

original: rdo rje gnod @315a * //
analyzed: rdo rje gnod @315a * //
translated: one should summon with the action seal of the vajra hook, bind with the action seal of the vajra noose, fetter with the action seal of the vajra fetter, and enthrall with the action seal of the vajra of wrath.

original: sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad nas phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas /
analyzed: sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad nas phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas /
translated: Having expelled obstructors with the vajra yakṣa, one should bind the directions, and so on.

original: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la khro bo rdo rje srung pas srung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs la /
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la khro bo rdo rje srung pas srung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs la /
translated: Having closed the door with the vajra fist of wrath, one should guard all the guards with the vajra protection of wrath.

original: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor lnga las bshad pa'i rig pas mchod yon du phul la /
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor lnga las bshad pa'i rig pas mchod yon du phul la /
translated: Having offered a libation with the awareness taught in the maṇḍala of the four seals,

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du byas nas /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du byas nas /
translated: Then, having made the Bhagavat Vairochana,

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas /🔽'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis mdung rtse gsum pa rdo rje'i phyag rgyas mnan pa la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis mdung rtse gsum pa rdo rje'i phyag rgyas mnan pa la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
translated: seal with the four seals explained in the great mandala of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds.🔽Then, having pressed down with the four seals, such as the vajra seal of the trident, with the four seals explained in the Dhāraṇī-Mandal of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds,

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya bzhi la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lnga dang rdo rje rin po che'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya bzhi la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lnga dang rdo rje rin po che'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /
translated: one should consecrate the Bhagavat Vairochana with the vajra-jewel seal explained in the Vajra-dhātu, and one should consecrate him with the consecration of the five bodies of the Tathāgata and the vajra-jewel garland with the four seals of the Dhāraṇī-Mandal of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds.

original: snga ma bzhin mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
translated: As before, make offerings with all offerings.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i cho gas slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i cho gas slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bya'o //
translated: Then, with the ritual of the maṇḍala of the three worlds, perform the extensive ritual of inducting the disciples into the maṇḍala of retention.

original: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa dang / slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa dang / slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the extensive ritual of the master’s acts and the extensive ritual of inducting the disciples,

original: dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa'i slob dpon gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa'i slob dpon gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain that the master who has obtained the pledges and initiation should accomplish the feats taught in the Trilokavijaya,

original: bcug nas phyag rgya bzhi yi dkyil 'khor gyi //
analyzed: bcug nas phyag rgya bzhi yi dkyil 'khor gyi //
translated: [it is said]: “Having entered, in the maṇḍala of the four seals,

original: zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: one should abide with a woman.”

original: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi bsgoms nas bud med dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba de'i ngo bo'i ye shes bslab pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi bsgoms nas bud med dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba de'i ngo bo'i ye shes bslab pa'o //
translated: Having meditated on the four secret seals of the maṇḍala of the four seals, one should abide with a woman. This is the instruction of the knowledge of the nature of that.

original: rang gi phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang gi phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having drawn the mandala of one's four seals, one should recite the purity of reality.🔽This is the mantra Om sarva-tathagata-visuddha-dharmata-ho.

original: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta bi shuddha dharmma te ho zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas rig pa 'di bzlas nas /
analyzed: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta bi shuddha dharmma te ho zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas rig pa 'di bzlas nas /
translated: Having recited this awareness with the yoga of Vajra Humkara,

original: ji srid du phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor thun bzhir sgom pa'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gam /
analyzed: ji srid du phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor thun bzhir sgom pa'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gam /
translated: for as long as one month,

original: zla ba drug gam /
analyzed: zla ba drug gam /
translated: or six months,

original: lo gcig gi bar du dkyil @315b 'khor de mngon sum du mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: lo gcig gi bar du dkyil @315b 'khor de mngon sum du mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: or one year, one should meditate on that mandala until it is seen in actuality through the yoga of meditating on the mandala of the four seals in four sessions.

original: de nas zla ba nya ba la phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor rang nyid kyis bris te /
analyzed: de nas zla ba nya ba la phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor rang nyid kyis bris te /
translated: Then, on the night of the full moon, one should draw the mandala of the four seals oneself.

original: gzhan gyis bri bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis bri bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not have it drawn by another.

original: de ltar bdag nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bri'o //
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bri'o //
translated: In that way, one should draw the mandala of the four seals of Vairochana and so forth.

original: chos nyid dag pa brjod ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos nyid dag pa brjod ces bya ba ni /
translated: One should recite the purity of reality.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i rig pa bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i rig pa bzlas pa'o //
translated: This is the recitation of the knowledge just explained.

original: bud med lhan cig gnas na yang //
analyzed: bud med lhan cig gnas na yang //
translated: Even if one dwells with a woman,

original: grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen pos /
analyzed: grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur // zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen pos /
translated: one will attain power.

original: bud med dang lhan cig tu gyur par lhag par mos nas lhan cig tu gnas pa des dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bud med dang lhan cig tu gyur par lhag par mos nas lhan cig tu gnas pa des dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the attainment of power by one who dwells with a woman, imagining that he is in union with the great seal of Vajrahūṃkāra, etc.

original: rang nyid kyis phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas zhugs la mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas zhugs la mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should draw the maṇḍala of the four seals with one’s own hand, enter it, and meditate throughout the night.

original: de nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus su rdo rje h'um mdzad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus su rdo rje h'um mdzad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, at sunrise, one will become like Vajrahūṃkāra.

original: rang gi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bris pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no//
analyzed: rang gi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bris pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no//
translated: “One should draw the maṇḍala of the four seals with one’s own hand” is as before.

original: chos nyid dag pa brjod la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos nyid dag pa brjod la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Reciting the expression of pure reality”

original: aom badzra bi shuddha drishta dza: zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: aom badzra bi shuddha drishta dza: zhes brjod cing /
translated: is reciting Oṃ vajra-śuddha-dṛṣṭa jaḥ.

original: chags pas bud med bltas nas ni //
analyzed: chags pas bud med bltas nas ni //
translated: Looking at a woman with passion,

original: grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: one will attain power.

original: zhes bya ba la shin tu bud med la chags pa ni des rang gi phyag rgya chen po la bltas la bsgoms te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la shin tu bud med la chags pa ni des rang gi phyag rgya chen po la bltas la bsgoms te /
translated: One who is very attached to women should look at his own great seal, and meditate on it.

original: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //🔽gang gi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro // gang gi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: If he accomplishes it in the manner previously explained, he will attain power.

original: chos nyid dag pa brjod la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos nyid dag pa brjod la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having drawn the mandala of the four seals, as before, he should say, The purity of reality.

original: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha mu kh'i h'um zhes brjod do //
analyzed: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha mu kh'i h'um zhes brjod do //
translated: He should say, Om, the pure face of intrinsic reality, hum.

original: bud med mdzes la 'phrad pas 'grub //🔽ces bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgya chen po sbyor bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon du byas la /
analyzed: bud med mdzes la 'phrad pas 'grub // ces bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgya chen po sbyor bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon du byas la /
translated: One who is attached to women will succeed by union with a beautiful woman.🔽One who has realized the perfection of wisdom by the union of the great seal of the great seal of the Lord of the Three Worlds,

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po mngon sum du gyur pa ni dngos grub thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po mngon sum du gyur pa ni dngos grub thob pa'o //
translated: and has actualized the great seal of the Lord of the Three Worlds, has attained power.

original: rang gi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Having drawn one’s own maṇḍala of the four seals, as before.

original: chos nyid dag pa brjod la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos nyid dag pa brjod la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Reciting the purity of reality,

original: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha k'a ya b'aka ma na karma badzri ham zhes brjod do //
analyzed: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha k'a ya b'aka ma na karma badzri ham zhes brjod do //
translated: one should recite Oṃ svabhāva viśuddha kāya vākka manakarma vajrī haṃ.

original: bcom ldan 'das las kyi h'um mdzad du byas la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das las kyi h'um mdzad du byas la /
translated: Having made the Blessed One into Karma-huṃkāra,

original: mdun du gnas pa'i rang gi phyag rgya chen po la 'khyud nas /
analyzed: mdun du gnas pa'i rang gi phyag rgya chen po la 'khyud nas /
translated: one should embrace the great seal that is in front,

original: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba bya'o //🔽des @316a * //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba bya'o // des @316a * //
translated: and one should perform the yoga of the perfection of wisdom that is pure by nature.

original: cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What will come of that?

original: dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
translated: One will attain power,

original: las kyi h'um mdzad du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: las kyi h'um mdzad du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: and one will become Karma-huṃkāra, is the meaning.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Then,

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means “furthermore.”

original: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba sbas pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba sbas pa'o //
translated: The secret of the maṇḍala of the four seals is hidden.

original: phyag rgya ni rigs lnga bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni rigs lnga bsgom pa'o //
translated: The seal is the meditation on the five families.

original: rigs lnga bsgoms pa de bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs lnga bsgoms pa de bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the meditation on the five clans.

original: dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang //
translated: And having entered this mandala,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: sngar bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas phyis /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas phyis /
translated: having entered the mandala of the four seals of the Bhagavat Vairocana explained above.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis ni //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis ni //
translated: With the five sensual qualities,

original: zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'i yid du 'ong ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'i yid du 'ong ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: This is the cause of the delight of the practitioner.🔽The supreme woman of another

original: gzhan gyi bud med mchog ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi bud med mchog ces bya ba ni /
translated: The best of others' wives is🔽.

original: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: the seal of Vajrahumkara, etc.

original: bud med mchog mdzes par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bud med mchog mdzes par gyur pa'o //
translated: The supreme woman is beautiful.

original: yid du 'ong ba des shin tu grub pa thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba des shin tu grub pa thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: By that delight, one attains the supreme attainment.

original: de la rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa'i rig pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'o //
analyzed: de la rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa'i rig pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'o //
translated: Therein, the awarenesses of Vairocana, Akshobhya, Ratnasambhava, Amitabha, and Amoghasiddhi are the five sensual qualities.

original: 'dod par byas pas na 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod par byas pas na 'dod pa ste /
translated: They are sensual because they are desired.

original: mngon par 'dod ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “supreme” is “desired.”

original: de ni dge ba ste /
analyzed: de ni dge ba ste /
translated: That is virtuous,

original: yid kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yid kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir /
translated: because it abandons the afflictions of desire and so forth in the mind.

original: yon tan zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yon tan zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ Qualities”

original: dpal gyi don te skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dpal gyi don te skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means “glory,” and the meaning of “endowed” is “possessing good fortune.”

original: 'dod pa dam par gyur pa'i dngos grub thob //
analyzed: 'dod pa dam par gyur pa'i dngos grub thob //
translated: One attains the supreme desired accomplishment.

original: ces bya'o // de skad du yang /
analyzed: ces bya'o // de skad du yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: gsang ba sra zhing mtho ba las //
analyzed: gsang ba sra zhing mtho ba las //
translated: From the firm and high secret

original: gsang ba lnga yis bsgrub pas ni //
analyzed: gsang ba lnga yis bsgrub pas ni //
translated: accomplished by the five secrets,

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga zhes bshad //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga zhes bshad //
translated: the five sense objects are explained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs //
translated: The Tathāgata family and so forth

original: rol pa bsgrub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rol pa bsgrub pa nyid yin no //
translated: are the accomplishment of play.

original: gzhan yang mi bskyod ye shes rigs //
analyzed: gzhan yang mi bskyod ye shes rigs //
translated: Moreover, Akṣhobhya is the family of gnosis,

original: rin chen la gnas de bzhin rigs //
analyzed: rin chen la gnas de bzhin rigs //
translated: and likewise Ratnasaṃbhava is the family of jewels,🔽Amitābha is the family of light,🔽and likewise Amoghasiddhi

original: 'od dpag med pa'i rigs rnams dang // de bzhin don yod grub pa dang // 'dir ni 'dod yon zhes su bshad //
analyzed: 'od dpag med pa'i rigs rnams dang // de bzhin don yod grub pa dang // 'dir ni 'dod yon zhes su bshad //
translated: is explained here as the sense objects.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che //
translated: All buddhas have great magical powers.

original: sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba //
analyzed: sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba //
translated: Compassion for all sentient beings.

original: zhes yang dang yang du rgyas par bshad do //
analyzed: zhes yang dang yang du rgyas par bshad do //
translated: Thus it is explained again and again in detail.

original: ho badzra karma zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod nas 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga la bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ho badzra karma zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod nas 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga la bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Having uttered HO BHAGAVĀN VAJRA KARMA three times, one should meditate on the five types of sense objects.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las @316b gsungs pa'i tshul gyis /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las @316b gsungs pa'i tshul gyis /
translated: In accordance with what is said in the Maṇḍala of Trilokavijaya,

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas ji skad gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas ji skad gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: one should perform the yoga as taught, with the application of Vajrahūṃkāra and so forth.

original: rang gi snying gar stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad dang mnyam pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad dang mnyam pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
translated: In one’s heart, equal to the realm of the billion-world universe, is the maṇḍala of the moon.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas zhugs te /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas zhugs te /
translated: Having entered through the application of space-like sameness,

original: yid kyis rdo rje h'um mdzad du bskyed la /
analyzed: yid kyis rdo rje h'um mdzad du bskyed la /
translated: one generates mentally Vajrahūṃkāra.

original: h'um zhes bya bas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por sprul te /
analyzed: h'um zhes bya bas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por sprul te /
translated: With HŪṃ, one emanates the maṇḍala of Trilokavijaya.

original: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ye h'um zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ye h'um zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: With Om sarva tathagata samaye hum, one should form the great seal of Vairochana,

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por sprul la /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por sprul la /
translated: emanate the mandala of the conqueror of the three worlds,

original: bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du gyur par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du gyur par bya'o //
translated: and transform oneself into Vairochana.

original: h'um badzra ma ta ces bya bas /
analyzed: h'um badzra ma ta ces bya bas /
translated: With Hum vajra ratna,

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
translated: one should form the great seal of Vajraratna.

original: aom bhri ku ti badzra ratna zhes bya bas rin chen h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom bhri ku ti badzra ratna zhes bya bas rin chen h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
translated: With Om bhrkuṭi vajra ratna, one should form the great seal of Ratnahumkara.

original: h'um padma badzri dhri ka ces bya bas chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ngo //
analyzed: h'um padma badzri dhri ka ces bya bas chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ngo //
translated: With Hum padma vajri dhrk, one should form the great seal of Dharmahumkara.

original: h'um badzra karmma aa krid ces bya bas /
analyzed: h'um badzra karmma aa krid ces bya bas /
translated: With Hum vajra karma akr,

original: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: one should form the great seal of Karmahumkara.🔽 With Hum hum hum,🔽one should form the great seal of Vajrapani.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bdag nyid kyis sprul par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bdag nyid kyis sprul par bya'o //
translated: I will emanate the great maṇḍala of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds myself.🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”

original: aom badzra dzva la aagna pra d'i pta a'a karsha ya sarbba ta th'a ga tam ma h'a sa ma ya h'um dza: zhes bya ba nas /🔽aom badzra aa bhi sha ma h'a kro dha sarbba sa ma ya h'um aa: zhes bya ba'i bar du tshig tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha thams cad snying pos bzhugs su gsol la /
analyzed: aom badzra dzva la aagna pra d'i pta a'a karsha ya sarbba ta th'a ga tam ma h'a sa ma ya h'um dza: zhes bya ba nas / aom badzra aa bhi sha ma h'a kro dha sarbba sa ma ya h'um aa: zhes bya ba'i bar du tshig tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha thams cad snying pos bzhugs su gsol la /
translated: “Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”

original: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod pas lha thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod pas lha thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: “Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ”

original: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par bsgoms la /🔽bdag nyid gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par bsgoms la /🔽bdag nyid gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par bsam par bya'o //
translated: “Oṃ vajra jñāna jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ

original: aom sarba sa mo& ham zhes brjod pas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bdag med pa'i rang bzhin du bdag gis bsam par bya'o ;
analyzed: aom sarba sa mo& ham zhes brjod pas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bdag med pa'i rang bzhin du bdag gis bsam par bya'o ;
translated: Having recited Om sarva samaham, one should contemplate, I am the nature of the Nairātmya maṇḍala of Trailokyavijaya.

original: / de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rang bzhin ni nga nyid yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed la 'di skad ces lan gsum brjod do //
analyzed: / de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rang bzhin ni nga nyid yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed la 'di skad ces lan gsum brjod do //
translated: Then, one should generate the pride, I am the nature of the great maṇḍala of Trailokyavijaya, and recite this three times:

original: ho badzra karmma zhes brjod do //
analyzed: ho badzra karmma zhes brjod do //
translated: Ho vajra karma.

original: de nas rang 'dod pa'i lha'i khro bo h'um mdzad bzhi'i sngags yid kyis bsam /
analyzed: de nas rang 'dod pa'i lha'i khro bo h'um mdzad bzhi'i sngags yid kyis bsam /
translated: Then, one should mentally contemplate the mantra of the four wrathful Humkara of one's desired deity.

original: rdo rje'i @317a * //
analyzed: rdo rje'i @317a * //
translated: With vajra speech,

original: tshig gam / khro bo'i bzlas brjod byas la /
analyzed: tshig gam / khro bo'i bzlas brjod byas la /
translated: or with the recitation of the wrathful ones,

original: rang gi snying ga'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bsgoms te /
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bsgoms te /
translated: one should meditate on the great maṇḍala of Trailokyavijaya in one's heart center.

original: ji srid mngon du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid mngon du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate until it is actually seen.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po bris la mtshan thog thag bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po bris la mtshan thog thag bsgoms nas /
translated: Then, having drawn the great maṇḍala and meditated throughout the night,

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: One will become Vajra Humkara, the glory of victory over the three worlds.

original: gal te 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'dod na rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang rin chen h'um mdzad dang ; las kyi h'um mdzad ma rnams kyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: gal te 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'dod na rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang rin chen h'um mdzad dang ; las kyi h'um mdzad ma rnams kyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: If one wishes to accomplish the retention mandala of the three worlds, one should bind the great seal of retention of Vairocana, and likewise of the three worlds, Ratnahumkara, and Karmahumkara,

original: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
analyzed: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
translated: with the five seals, such as the Oṃ sarva tathāgata vajra samaye hiṃ,

original: phyag rgya rnam pa lngas sngar bshad pa bzhin du rang gi snying gar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la /
analyzed: phyag rgya rnam pa lngas sngar bshad pa bzhin du rang gi snying gar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la /
translated: and so forth, and emanate the retention mandala in one’s heart, as previously explained.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rig pas rang gi gnas rnams su gzungs thams cad bkod nas /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rig pas rang gi gnas rnams su gzungs thams cad bkod nas /
translated: Having arranged all the retention mantras in their respective places with the awareness taught in the three worlds’ retention mandala,

original: sngar bshad pa'i snying po brjod pa'i rim gyis sgom pa rnam pa bzhi byas te /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i snying po brjod pa'i rim gyis sgom pa rnam pa bzhi byas te /
translated: Having performed the four kinds of meditation by the procedure of reciting the essence-mantra as previously explained,

original: re re zhing bzlas brjod khri byas nas des 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: re re zhing bzlas brjod khri byas nas des 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: one should accomplish it by means of ten thousand recitations of each.

original: de nas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris la /
analyzed: de nas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris la /
translated: Then, having drawn the dhāraṇī maṇḍala just as it is,

original: mtshan thog thag sgom pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan thog thag sgom pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: one should accomplish it by means of meditation throughout the night.

original: gal te 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'dod na snga ma bzhin phyag rgya rnam pa lngas rang gi snying gar chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la /🔽chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags rnams brjod pa tsam gyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: gal te 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'dod na snga ma bzhin phyag rgya rnam pa lngas rang gi snying gar chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la / chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags rnams brjod pa tsam gyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
translated: If one wishes to accomplish the Dharma maṇḍala of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds, one should emanate the Dharma maṇḍala at one’s heart by means of the five kinds of seals as before.

original: khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rang gi gnas su bkod la /
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rang gi gnas su bkod la /
translated: Having merely recited the mantras taught in the Dharma maṇḍala, one should arrange Vairocana and so forth up to Vajra Wrathful Subjugation in their own places.

original: snga ma bzhin du snying po brjod pa'i rim gyis don rnam pa bzhi bsgoms te /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du snying po brjod pa'i rim gyis don rnam pa bzhi bsgoms te /
translated: Having performed the four kinds of meditation by the procedure of reciting the essence-mantra as previously explained,

original: de nas sna'i rtse mor snying ga na gnas pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bteg ste /
analyzed: de nas sna'i rtse mor snying ga na gnas pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bteg ste /
translated: Then, having lifted up the wheel of phenomena located at the heart to the tip of the nose,

original: sna'i rtse mor chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sngags yid kyis brjod cing thams cad bdag yin no zhes bsgom zhing ji srid mngon sum du gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mor chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sngags yid kyis brjod cing thams cad bdag yin no zhes bsgom zhing ji srid mngon sum du gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: mentally recite the mantra of Vajrahūṃkāra from the wheel of phenomena at the tip of the nose, and meditate on “all is I” until it becomes manifest.

original: de nas spro ba dang / bsdu ba'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig bsgoms la /
analyzed: de nas spro ba dang / bsdu ba'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig bsgoms la /
translated: Then, having meditated for one month by the yoga of emanating and gathering,

original: @317b de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor bris te /
analyzed: @317b de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor bris te /
translated: then draw the wheel of phenomena,

original: mtshan thog thag bsgoms na ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan thog thag bsgoms na ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: and if one meditates throughout the night, one will attain all meditative concentrations.

original: gal te 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'dod na /
translated: If one wishes to accomplish the activity maṇḍala of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds,

original: de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: one should perform all the rites in the same way,

original: aom badzra p'a ni badzra karmma ka rodbha ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di dang / sna tshogs rdo rje phyag rgya 'dis gzung ngo //
analyzed: aom badzra p'a ni badzra karmma ka rodbha ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di dang / sna tshogs rdo rje phyag rgya 'dis gzung ngo //
translated: and this mudra of the vajra cross.

original: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /🔽rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings pas //
analyzed: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te / rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings pas //
translated: The mudra is as follows:🔽Having formed the two vajra-fists,

original: de gnyis rdo rje dam du gzung //
analyzed: de gnyis rdo rje dam du gzung //
translated: one should hold the two vajras firmly.

original: mdzub mo mthe'u chung ba snol ba ni //
analyzed: mdzub mo mthe'u chung ba snol ba ni //
translated: The index and little fingers crossed

original: rdo rje gos mchog dkyil 'khor ro //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gos mchog dkyil 'khor ro // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is the maṇḍala of Vajra­varahi.

original: de ltar sna tshogs rdo rje blangs nas /
analyzed: de ltar sna tshogs rdo rje blangs nas /
translated: Thus, having taken up the vajra cross,

original: yid kyis de bzhin du snying gar zhugs te /
analyzed: yid kyis de bzhin du snying gar zhugs te /
translated: one should mentally enter it in the same way into one’s heart.

original: snga ma bzhin du rig pa rnam pa lngas rang gi snying gar las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sprul la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rig pa rnam pa lngas rang gi snying gar las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sprul la /
translated: As before, one should emanate the deities of the karma maṇḍala in one’s heart with the five awarenesses.

original: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa rnams kyis rang gi gnas su bzhag la sngar bshad pa'i snying po brjod pa'i rim gyis don rnam pa bzhi bsgoms te /
analyzed: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa rnams kyis rang gi gnas su bzhag la sngar bshad pa'i snying po brjod pa'i rim gyis don rnam pa bzhi bsgoms te /
translated: One should place them in their own places with the awarenesses explained in the karma maṇḍala, and one should meditate on the four topics, as previously explained, by means of the essence mantras.

original: re re zhing bzlas pa khri byas pas /
analyzed: re re zhing bzlas pa khri byas pas /
translated: One should perform ten thousand recitations for each.

analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris la /
translated: Similarly, having drawn the maṇḍala,

original: dbus su bcom ldan 'das las kyi h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'i h'um badzra karmma aa gri krig ces bya ba 'dis bri'o //
analyzed: dbus su bcom ldan 'das las kyi h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'i h'um badzra karmma aa gri krig ces bya ba 'dis bri'o //
translated: in the center one should draw the seal of the Blessed One Karma-hūṃkāra with Hum vajra karma agni krik.

original: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su las thams cad pa /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su las thams cad pa /
translated: In the place of Akṣobhya, one should draw the seal of Karma-samaya with

original: aom sarbba mu kham karmma badzra ni ma h'a kro dhe ku ru sarbba hni /
analyzed: aom sarbba mu kham karmma badzra ni ma h'a kro dhe ku ru sarbba hni /
translated: Om sarva mukha karma vajra ni maha krodhe kuru sarva hanim.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su khro bo rdo rje go cha /
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su khro bo rdo rje go cha /
translated: In the place of Ratnasaṃbhava, one should draw the seal of Krodha-vajra-varma with

original: aom badzra ka ba kro dhe ra kra mam hta zhes bya ba 'dis bri'o //
analyzed: aom badzra ka ba kro dhe ra kra mam hta zhes bya ba 'dis bri'o //
translated: Om vajra kavaca krodhe raṭa mahā.

original: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su rdo rje gtum po /
analyzed: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su rdo rje gtum po /
translated: In the place of Amoghasiddhi, one should draw the seal of Vajra-caṇḍa with

original: aom badzra bandha kro dhe ma h'a a'a sha ni badzra damshtv'a ka r'a lo grabhi sha na bha sha pa ya hni zhes bya ba 'dis bri'o //
analyzed: aom badzra bandha kro dhe ma h'a a'a sha ni badzra damshtv'a ka r'a lo grabhi sha na bha sha pa ya hni zhes bya ba 'dis bri'o //
translated: Om vajra bandha krodhe mahā aśani vajra daṃṣṭra kara lo grabhīṣaṇa bhasha pāya hanim.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su gzungs kyi khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya /
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su gzungs kyi khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya /
translated: In the abode of Amitābha, the mudrā sign of the wrathful vajra fist dhāraṇī.

original: aom badzra kro dhe mushti bandha hni zhes bya ba 'dis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra kro dhe mushti bandha hni zhes bya ba 'dis bri bar bya'o //
translated: With the mantra “Oṃ vajra-krodha-muṣṭi-bandha hana,” it should be drawn.

original: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi ni /
analyzed: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi ni /
translated: There, the four forms beginning with Vajrahūṃkāra

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya rang rang gi rnam pa bzhi gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya rang rang gi rnam pa bzhi gzung bar bya'o //
translated: should be taken as the mantras and mudrās taught in the Maṇḍala of Trilokavijaya, each with its own four forms.

original: lhag ma rnams ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa yin no //
translated: The rest are explained in the Dhāraṇī Maṇḍala of Trilokavijaya.

original: de ltar ras dang rtsig pa dang nam mkha' la bris pa de thams cad kyis phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub thams cad thob pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar ras dang rtsig pa dang nam mkha' la bris pa de thams cad kyis phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub thams cad thob pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, it should be known that all the accomplishments of the four mudrā maṇḍalas are attained by drawing on cloth, a wall, or in space.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu las /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu las /
translated: From the Trilokavijaya-khaṇḍaka.

original: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The explanation of the maṇḍala of the four seals is complete.

original: // / de ltar bar ma la dga' ba'i sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / de ltar bar ma la dga' ba'i sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: Thus, in order to take care of all sentient beings who delight in the intermediate,

original: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs nas /🔽da ni mdor bsdus @321a * //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs nas / da ni mdor bsdus @321a * //
translated: the maṇḍala of the four seals is explained.

original: pa la dga' ba'i sems can rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: pa la dga' ba'i sems can rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to take care of sentient beings who delight in the concise,🔽then Vajrapāṇi, the bodhisattva mahāsattva,

original: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no //
translated: says “then” and so on, teaching the maṇḍala of the single mudra of the conqueror of the three worlds.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: Then means immediately after,

original: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: meaning “after the samādhi of the initial union.”

original: de la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: There, having performed the yoga of Vajrahūṃkāra in the manner of the Great Maṇḍala of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds,

original: de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i sgrub pa bya'o//
analyzed: de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i sgrub pa bya'o//
translated: One should perform the great yoga practice as explained in that.

original: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: Then, having formed the great mudra of Vajra Humkara,

original: nam mkha'i phyogs su 'dug la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i phyogs su 'dug la /
translated: one should sit in the direction of space

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag thams cad aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharmma n'am a'abya nutpanna tv'ata ces bya ba 'di yid kyis brjod pas nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag thams cad aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharmma n'am a'abya nutpanna tv'ata ces bya ba 'di yid kyis brjod pas nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and meditate on all these buddhafields as being equal to space by mentally reciting this, “Akaro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām āyur anutpannatvaṃ tathā.

original: de nas 'og tu yam las rlung gi gi dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: de nas 'og tu yam las rlung gi gi dkyil 'khor /
translated: Then below, from yaṃ arises a wind maṇḍala,

original: de'i steng du bam las chu /
analyzed: de'i steng du bam las chu /
translated: on top of that, from vaṃ arises water,

original: de'i steng du sum las gser gyi sa gzhi /
analyzed: de'i steng du sum las gser gyi sa gzhi /
translated: on top of that, from suṃ arises a golden ground,

original: yang de'i steng du yi ge bam las rgya mtsho chen po /
analyzed: yang de'i steng du yi ge bam las rgya mtsho chen po /
translated: and on top of that, from the syllable vaṃ arises the great ocean,

original: de'i dbus su h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba las ri'i rgyal po ri rab ste /
analyzed: de'i dbus su h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba las ri'i rgyal po ri rab ste /
translated: in the middle of which, from hūṃ suṃ hūṃ, arises Mount Sumeru, the king of mountains.

original: rin po che bzhi'i rang bzhin can zur bzhi pa rin po che du mas brgyan pa stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad dang mnyam par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rin po che bzhi'i rang bzhin can zur bzhi pa rin po che du mas brgyan pa stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad dang mnyam par bsam par bya'o //
translated: It is square, made of the nature of the four jewels, and adorned with many jewels, and is imagined to be equal in size to the buddhafield of a billion-world universe.🔽Reciting Oṃ vajra-dṛdhā-vajrāveśa sarvaṃ svāhā,

original: aom badzra di dho me bhaba raksha sarbbam sv'a h'a zhes brjod pa dang / rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang ba sa la reg pas sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra di dho me bhaba raksha sarbbam sv'a h'a zhes brjod pa dang / rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang ba sa la reg pas sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: and with the vajra-bound fingers extended and touching the ground, one should bless it as having the nature of a variegated vajra cross.

original: de nas rdo rje chen po'i ri rab kyi rtse mor yi ge h'um las rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa sprul la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje chen po'i ri rab kyi rtse mor yi ge h'um las rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa sprul la /
translated: Then, on the peak of the great vajra Mount Meru, one emanates a palace made of vajras, jewels, and gems from the syllable hūṃ.

original: yang dag par bsrungs te /
analyzed: yang dag par bsrungs te /
translated: Having thoroughly protected it,

original: khang bu brtsegs pa'i dbus su h'um ga h'um zhes bya bas glang po che'i gdan gnyis bskyed la /
analyzed: khang bu brtsegs pa'i dbus su h'um ga h'um zhes bya bas glang po che'i gdan gnyis bskyed la /
translated: in the center of the palace, one generates two elephant thrones with hūṃ gaja and hūṃ gajāri.

original: de'i steng du yi ge aas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis bskyed de /
analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge aas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis bskyed de /
translated: Upon that, one generates two moon maṇḍalas from the syllable a.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam bar rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam bar rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Form the mudra of total victory over the three worlds,

original: h'um bzhi brjod nas /🔽'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa phyung nas /
analyzed: h'um bzhi brjod nas / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa phyung nas /
translated: recite the four hūṃs,🔽and imagine that vajra hūṃkāra forms emerge from the hearts of all tathāgatas equal to the number of atoms in all world systems.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra ra ba dang mnyam @321b pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rigs kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra ra ba dang mnyam @321b pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rigs kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas
translated: They transform into all tathāgatas equal to the number of atoms in all world systems, and they bless all the maṇḍalas of the retinue of bodhisattvas residing in all world systems as the form of the vajra family.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa gang yin pa rnams dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te rang gi dam tshig la bzhag nas /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa gang yin pa rnams dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te rang gi dam tshig la bzhag nas /
translated: Those who are the great maṇḍala of the total victory in the three worlds are summoned, caused to enter, bound, and controlled, and are placed in one’s own pledge.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku gcig tu gyur te /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku gcig tu gyur te /
translated: Then, having become one body of Vajra Hūṃkāra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la zhugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la zhugs so //
translated: he enters into the mind of all tathāgatas.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa yan lag thams cad las bskal pa'i me chen po'i 'od dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje khro bo phyung nas yang bsdus
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa yan lag thams cad las bskal pa'i me chen po'i 'od dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje khro bo phyung nas yang bsdus
translated: Then, having remained with his left leg extended in the mind of all tathāgatas, he emits from all his limbs vajra wrathful ones equal to the particles of all world realms, equal to the light of the great fire of the eon, and again gathers them.

original: te khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus su sngar gyi glang po che'i gdan gyi steng du bzhugs so zhes bya ba 'di ni dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
analyzed: te khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus su sngar gyi glang po che'i gdan gyi steng du bzhugs so zhes bya ba 'di ni dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
translated: Then, having remained in the center of the palace on the previous elephant seat, this is the first concentration of union.

original: phyag na rdo rje ni bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje ni bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
translated: Vajrapani is the Vajra Humkara just explained.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor la ltos pas na yang zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor la ltos pas na yang zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Again is stated because of the reference to the mandala of the four seals.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa'i rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bo 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa'i rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bo 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is stated means that he spoke of this wrathful one of the pledge of the vajra that abides in the mind.

original: rang ni bdag nyid de las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: rang ni bdag nyid de las skyes pa'o //
translated: Self means that he was born from himself.

original: dam tshig gi khro bo ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i khro bo ste /
analyzed: dam tshig gi khro bo ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i khro bo ste /
translated: The wrathful one of the pledge is the wrathful one who should not be transgressed.

original: rang gi rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bo ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad de yi ge h'um las de skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bo ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad de yi ge h'um las de skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: The wrathful one of one's own vajra pledge is the Bhagavat Vajra Humkara, who is generated from the syllable hum.

original: de gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
translated: His statement is his explanation.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i glang po che'i gdan la 'dug nas /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i glang po che'i gdan la 'dug nas /
translated: Having sat upon the elephant throne as explained,

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rang gi thugs las rdo rje h'um mdzad sprul la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rang gi thugs las rdo rje h'um mdzad sprul la /
translated: the Bhagavat Vajra Humkara emanates the wrathful one of his own mind, Vajra Humkara.

original: yi ge h'um 'don cing mdun du bskyed de /
analyzed: yi ge h'um 'don cing mdun du bskyed de /
translated: Having recited the syllable hūṃ, one should generate it in front.

original: glang po che'i steng du shar phyogs su kha bltas te gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: glang po che'i steng du shar phyogs su kha bltas te gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa yin no //
translated: One should place it on the back of an elephant, facing east. This is the second meditative stabilization called “the supreme royal maṇḍala of Vajrahūṃkāra.”

original: 'dir yang rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin yang de bzhin du rjes su sbyangs nas /
analyzed: 'dir yang rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin yang de bzhin du rjes su sbyangs nas /
translated: Here also, the practitioner, having practiced the meditative stabilization in the same way,

original: de nas bsdu ba byas te las kyi rgyal po mchog bsgom pa snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba byas te las kyi rgyal po mchog bsgom pa snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: then having withdrawn, should meditate on the supreme royal activity, as before.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bur gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil @322a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bur gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil @322a * //
translated: In the chapter on the “three worlds,” all the powers are explained in the maṇḍala of the single mudra of Vajrahūṃkāra.

original: 'khor du bshad pa'i dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'khor du bshad pa'i dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: One should practice them having obtained the initiation and the commitments.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach this, [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then,” and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa'o //
translated: Then is the proper occasion.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad dpa' bo gcig tu bshad ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad dpa' bo gcig tu bshad ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin no //
translated: The mandala of the hero Vajra Humkara, the Blessed One, has just been explained.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i ste sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i ste sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Then is the immediately following, after the preliminary service has been performed.

original: de nas rgyu de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nas rgyu de'i phyir ro //
translated: Then is the cause for that.

original: gang gi phyir phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i don grub par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir rab tu bshad par bya'o //🔽gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i don grub par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir rab tu bshad par bya'o // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
translated: Since the accomplishment of the meaning of the concise is not possible without entering the mandala of the single seal, therefore it should be fully explained.🔽The supreme secret mandala

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is the supreme secret mandala.

original: de la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad ni rdo rje h'um mdzad gcig pus dngos grub thams cad bsdus par gyur pa'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang bas na sba ba ste /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad ni rdo rje h'um mdzad gcig pus dngos grub thams cad bsdus par gyur pa'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang bas na sba ba ste /
translated: The mandala of the single seal is secret,

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //🔽gsang ba yang yin la /
