analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bka' dang / rdo rje'i tshig dang phyag rgya ji lta bas brgyal ba las bslangs nas /
translated: the Bhagavat Vairocana's command and vajra words and mudras raised him from his faint.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi zhabs kyi gnon pa de dag de la zhabs kyi mthil gyis reg pa'i mthus gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa skyes nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi zhabs kyi gnon pa de dag de la zhabs kyi mthil gyis reg pa'i mthus gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa skyes nas /
translated: By the power of the soles of the feet of the Bhagavat Vajra Humkara touching him, he gave rise to inconceivable dhāraṇīs, samādhis, and so on.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus snga ma'i lus de yongs su btang ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus snga ma'i lus de yongs su btang ste /
translated: By the power of samādhi, he gave up his previous body.

original: thal bas khebs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lha chen po srid pa tha ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i @325b lus su bdag nyid du gyur nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to //
analyzed: thal bas khebs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lha chen po srid pa tha ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i @325b lus su bdag nyid du gyur nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to //
translated: In the world covered with ashes, the great god, having become the body of the bodhisattva in his last existence, became a perfect buddha.

original: de nas lha chen po'i lus de thams cad nas thams cad du rnam par shes pa med pa la sogs par gyur to zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nas lha chen po'i lus de thams cad nas thams cad du rnam par shes pa med pa la sogs par gyur to zhes bya'o //
translated: Then that body of the great god became completely devoid of consciousness and so on.

original: gal te la la dag brgyal ba de dang des rang nyid sangs rgyas pa lta bur snang bar mthong zhes 'chad de /
analyzed: gal te la la dag brgyal ba de dang des rang nyid sangs rgyas pa lta bur snang bar mthong zhes 'chad de /
translated: If someone were to see that fainting, it would appear as if he himself were a buddha.

original: bshad pa 'di ni gzhung gi don ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa 'di ni gzhung gi don ma yin no //
translated: This explanation is not the meaning of the text.

original: gsang ba'i lcags kyu bsdams byas te //
analyzed: gsang ba'i lcags kyu bsdams byas te //
translated: Having made the secret hook,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa la mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba cung zad bskum nas lcags kyu ltar byas pa 'di ni gsang ba'i lcags kyu ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa la mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba cung zad bskum nas lcags kyu ltar byas pa 'di ni gsang ba'i lcags kyu ste /
translated: This is the secret hook: having bound the vajra fist inside, extend the two index fingers slightly bent, making it like a hook.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje rgyal po'i gnas su bstan zin to //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje rgyal po'i gnas su bstan zin to //
translated: The Vajra King position has been taught in the Maṇḍala of the Dhāraṇī of Victory in the Three Worlds.

original: de dag brtan par byas la /
analyzed: de dag brtan par byas la /
translated: Having made those firm,

original: tha ma mnyam du brkyang byas la //
analyzed: tha ma mnyam du brkyang byas la //
translated: the little fingers extended together in the end.

original: zhes bya ba ni mthe'u chung gnyis khab ltar brkyang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mthe'u chung gnyis khab ltar brkyang ba'o //
translated: This means that the two little fingers are extended like needles.

original: shi ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni //
analyzed: shi ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni //
translated: If one places it on the head of a corpse,

original: srog ni phyir yang thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: srog ni phyir yang thob par 'gyur //
translated: life will be restored.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni thun mong bar gyur pa'i ngo bo 'di bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni thun mong bar gyur pa'i ngo bo 'di bshad pa yin no //
translated: This explains the common nature of this [mudra].

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba ste /
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba ste /
translated: Amazing! means wonderful!

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pa'o //
translated: It is the unsurpassed wisdom of all the Buddhas.

original: 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
translated: What is so amazing here?

original: gang gi phyir ni shi ba'i lus 'di yang 'tsho ba'i khams su gyur pa yin no zhes smos te rnam par shes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ni shi ba'i lus 'di yang 'tsho ba'i khams su gyur pa yin no zhes smos te rnam par shes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is said, Because even this dead body becomes a living body, that is, it becomes endowed with consciousness.

original: rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs pa //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs pa //
translated: The excellent finger of the Vajra Wrathful One,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis bkan te /🔽zur sprad nas sbyar te de'i rtse mo bsgyur bar byas nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis bkan te / zur sprad nas sbyar te de'i rtse mo bsgyur bar byas nas /
translated: This is the gesture of Vajra Wrath, with the two index fingers crossed and touching, the tips bent over.

original: 'og nas bslang ste 'byin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'og nas bslang ste 'byin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: One should know that the gesture of raising up, which is raised up from below, is the gesture of raising up, which raises up from below one's own feet.

original: de ltar zhabs kyi 'og nas bton pa'i phyag rgyas rang gi zhabs kyi 'og nas bton te /
analyzed: de ltar zhabs kyi 'og nas bton pa'i phyag rgyas rang gi zhabs kyi 'og nas bton te /
translated: Thus, the gesture of raising up, which is raised up from below, raises up from below one's own feet.

original: rdo rje bslang ba'i phyag rgyas blang bar bya'o zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bslang ba'i phyag rgyas blang bar bya'o zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the gesture of raising up, which is raised up from below, is the gesture of raising up, which raises up from below one's own feet.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa des zhes bya ba ni thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs des sos par byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa des zhes bya ba ni thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs des sos par byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: The Tathagata, the one called Bhasmeśvarīkīrti, blessed him with life,

original: sprul pa'i lus rnams par shes pa dang bcas pa brtan par mdzad do //
analyzed: sprul pa'i lus rnams par shes pa dang bcas pa brtan par mdzad do //
translated: and made the emanated body firm with consciousness.

original: rang nyid kyi rgyal tshab tu bcug go zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal po'i lha chen po rgyal tshab tu'o //
analyzed: rang nyid kyi rgyal tshab tu bcug go zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal po'i lha chen po rgyal tshab tu'o //
translated: He made him his own regent, that is, the great god Maheśvara, the king of the world of the Bhagavat Vajra Humkara, the lord of the world with afflictions.

original: lha chen po de thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba rang nyid kyi rgyal tshab @326a * //
analyzed: lha chen po de thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba rang nyid kyi rgyal tshab @326a * //
translated: The great god, called the Lord of Ashes, was installed as his regent.

original: tu bcug pa ni des de gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: tu bcug pa ni des de gzhag pa'o //
translated: He placed him there.

original: gang du zhe na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du'o //
analyzed: gang du zhe na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du'o //
translated: Where? In this very Sahā world system.

original: ci'i don du zhe na sems can gyi don du'o //
analyzed: ci'i don du zhe na sems can gyi don du'o //
translated: For what purpose? For the sake of sentient beings.

original: ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In order to subdue all evildoers.

original: 'jigs byed kyi gzugs can gyis gdug pa'i sems can thams cad 'dul ba la rab tu gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: 'jigs byed kyi gzugs can gyis gdug pa'i sems can thams cad 'dul ba la rab tu gzhag pa'o //
translated: He placed him in the subduing of all evil sentient beings with a terrifying form.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
translated: The word then means immediately.

original: dbang phyug chen po'i lus rgyal tshab tu bcug pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po'i lus rgyal tshab tu bcug pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: After the body of Maheśvara was installed as the regent,

original: de nas ni de'i phyir te /
analyzed: de nas ni de'i phyir te /
translated: then, after that,

original: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis dbang phyug chen po mnan pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis dbang phyug chen po mnan pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because the Blessed Vajrapāṇi pressed down on Maheśvara with the sole of his foot,

original: / zhabs kyi mthil zhes bya ba ni thugs la dgongs nas so //
analyzed: / zhabs kyi mthil zhes bya ba ni thugs la dgongs nas so //
translated: the sole of his foot, with an intention in mind.

original: zla ba'i zhabs kyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zla ba'i zhabs kyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The moon is the bodhisattva who is the form of the moon, who is all-good, and whose feet are the light of the mass of light rays.

original: kun nas bzang po'i zla ba'i gzugs kyi byang chub sems de'i zhabs kyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi snang ba can gyi rig pa ni zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya'o //🔽'di nyid bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems kyi phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: kun nas bzang po'i zla ba'i gzugs kyi byang chub sems de'i zhabs kyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi snang ba can gyi rig pa ni zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya'o // 'di nyid bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems kyi phyag rgya ni /
translated: The seal is the knowledge that is illuminated by that light.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po kun du bzang po ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po kun du bzang po ste /
translated: The seal of the enlightenment spirit of all the Tathagatas is the enlightenment spirit of all the Tathagatas, which is all-good.

original: de gsal bar byed pa'i phyag rgya nges par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa'i phyag rgya nges par 'byung ba'o //
translated: The emergence is the seal that illuminates that.

original: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
translated: Having made the vajra bond,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings su gsungs pa'i rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings su gsungs pa'i rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la ;
translated: means that one should bind the vajra bond as taught in the Vajra Realm Tantra,

original: mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis legs par brkyang nas dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo'i rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du gzhag pa ni zla ba ri mo'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis legs par brkyang nas dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo'i rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du gzhag pa ni zla ba ri mo'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: and having extended the two thumbs and little fingers, one should place them on the left ear of the head of Mahesvara. This is the seal of the moon.

original: zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems chen po zla ba'i gzugs can gyi bla ma ni /
analyzed: zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems chen po zla ba'i gzugs can gyi bla ma ni /
translated: The Tathagata Candrabuddhi is the guru of the moon, who is the great enlightenment mind in the form of the moon.

original: gzhan las khyad par du gyur pas zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o //
analyzed: gzhan las khyad par du gyur pas zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o //
translated: Since he is distinguished from others, he is the Tathagata Candrabuddhi, the great enlightenment mind, the Great Illuminator.

original: phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mnan pas zla ba phyed pa'i dbang bskur bar gyur nas /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mnan pas zla ba phyed pa'i dbang bskur bar gyur nas /
translated: Since he stepped on the feet of Vajrapani, he became the one who bestows the consecration of the half-moon.

original: dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo'i rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du zhabs kyis bzhag pas dbang phyug chen po byang chub kyi sems chen po rtogs nas /
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo'i rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du zhabs kyis bzhag pas dbang phyug chen po byang chub kyi sems chen po rtogs nas /
translated: Since he placed his foot on the top of the left ear of Mahesvara's head, Mahesvara realized the great enlightenment mind.

original: dri ma med pa'i sems su gyur te /
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i sems su gyur te /
translated: He became a stainless mind.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thal pa'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya bar bdag nyid skyes so zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thal pa'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya bar bdag nyid skyes so zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Then, in order to demonstrate that he was born as the Tathagata Karapratalaghosa,

original: gang gi phyir bskal pa chen po'i bar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi zhabs @326b kyis mnan cing gzhag pa dang dbang du bya ba'i don bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bskal pa chen po'i bar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi zhabs @326b kyis mnan cing gzhag pa dang dbang du bya ba'i don bstan pa yin no //
translated: Because for the duration of a great eon, the Blessed One Vajra Hūṃkāra pressed down on and placed his foot on Maheśvara, in order to teach the meaning of subjugation.

original: dbang phyug chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi zhabs kyis reg pas bla na med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba thob ste /
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi zhabs kyis reg pas bla na med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba thob ste /
translated: And that Maheśvara, by being touched by the foot of the Blessed One Vajra Hūṃkāra, attained unsurpassed bliss and mental happiness.

original: bla na med pa'i gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par mdzad do ;
analyzed: bla na med pa'i gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par mdzad do ;
translated: He realized the unsurpassed dhāraṇīs, doors of liberation, and perfections.

original: / de nas zhabs kyi 'og tu 'chi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams thal bas khebs par srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpar gyur nas /
analyzed: / de nas zhabs kyi 'og tu 'chi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams thal bas khebs par srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpar gyur nas /
translated: Then, after passing away from under his foot, in the world system covered with ashes, he became a bodhisattva in his final existence.

original: de nas mngon par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de nas mngon par sangs rgyas so //
translated: Then he attained perfect buddhahood.

original: la la dag der skyes pa ni sems kyi snang ba tsam yin no snyam na /
analyzed: la la dag der skyes pa ni sems kyi snang ba tsam yin no snyam na /
translated: Some think that being born there is merely a mental appearance.

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is also unreasonable.

original: gsungs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsungs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not stated.

original: de ltar bshad pa yin na /
analyzed: de ltar bshad pa yin na /
translated: If this is explained in this way,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu chen po dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu chen po dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: it would contradict the great power of the Tathagata.

original: kho bo cag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i skal ba dang mi ldan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags la gus pas tshe 'di las sangs rgyas nyid rnyed pa dang ; rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba na dbang phyug chen po rgyal tshab tu gyur pas thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rigs pa dang yang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: kho bo cag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i skal ba dang mi ldan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags la gus pas tshe 'di las sangs rgyas nyid rnyed pa dang ; rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba na dbang phyug chen po rgyal tshab tu gyur pas thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rigs pa dang yang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Even those who are not fortunate enough to see the Tathagata, by respectfully relying on the mantra of the Tathagata, will attain Buddhahood in this life and obtain the state of Vajradhara. But if it is obtained by Mahesvara, who has become the regent, it would contradict reason.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Then means immediately after the empowerment.

original: lag tu rdo rje mdung rtse byin nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lag tu rdo rje mdung rtse byin nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The vajra spear is given into the hand.

original: dbang phyug chen po'i lag pa g-yon pa der /
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po'i lag pa g-yon pa der /
translated: In the left hand of Mahesvara,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag g-yas pas rdo rje mdung rtse byin nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag g-yas pas rdo rje mdung rtse byin nas /
translated: the Tathagata gives the vajra spear with his right hand.

original: rdo rje rig pa dam po zhes ming gi dbang bskur ba byin no //
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa dam po zhes ming gi dbang bskur ba byin no //
translated: He gives the name empowerment, Vajravidyottama.

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
translated: Ahameva means I myself.

original: ci zhig ngo mtshar zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig ngo mtshar zhe na /
translated: What is amazing?

original: zhabs mchog gis ni gang reg pa//
analyzed: zhabs mchog gis ni gang reg pa//
translated: He says, By the touch of the supreme feet,

original: sangs rgyas nyid du grub pa thob //🔽ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid du grub pa thob // ces bya ba smos te /
translated: I attained the accomplishment of buddhahood.

original: bdag ni ngo mtshar che ba'o //
analyzed: bdag ni ngo mtshar che ba'o //
translated: I myself am amazing.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rkang pas mnan cing tshar gcad pa rnams khro ba dang khon skyes pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: rkang pas mnan cing tshar gcad pa rnams khro ba dang khon skyes pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur la /
translated: Those who are trampled and punished by the feet of the Conqueror go to the lower realms out of anger and resentment.

original: 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje zhabs kyi mchog gis bdag la reg pas byang chub rtogs pa'i rgyur gyur pas na tshar gcad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje zhabs kyi mchog gis bdag la reg pas byang chub rtogs pa'i rgyur gyur pas na tshar gcad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But here, by the touch of the supreme feet of Bhagavān Vajrapāṇi, I became the cause of realizing enlightenment, so it was not a punishment.

original: gang gi phyir bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur pa 'di la gdul bya rnams kyi zhabs kyis mnan cing tshar gcad par mthong ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur pa 'di la gdul bya rnams kyi zhabs kyis mnan cing tshar gcad par mthong ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
translated: Since I attained buddhahood, seeing those to be tamed trampled and punished by the feet of the Conqueror is amazing.

original: de'i phyir rdo rje khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin de las @327a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin de las @327a * //
translated: Therefore, from that vajra wrathful meditative stabilization,

original: langs nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: langs nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Having arisen means that having arisen from the samadhi of Vajra Humkara, he abides in the form of Vajrasattva.🔽 This is the meaning of the passage.

original: gang gi phyir rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rdo rje h'um mdzad du gyur pa yin gyi ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rdo rje h'um mdzad du gyur pa yin gyi ;
translated: Because Vajrasattva here becomes the wheel-turning Tathagata Vajra Humkara,

original: lcang lo can na gnas pa'i sa bcu'i dbang phyug ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lcang lo can na gnas pa'i sa bcu'i dbang phyug ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the lord of the tenth stage who resides in the Akanistha heaven.

original: ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin de las langs she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin de las langs she na /
translated: Why does he arise from that samadhi?

original: nyon mongs pa gzhan gyi dbang du ma gyur pa'i mnyam par bzhag pas de gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen cing ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa la gzhug par bya zhes bstan pa'i don du dgongs pa yod pas na bzhengs pa yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa gzhan gyi dbang du ma gyur pa'i mnyam par bzhag pas de gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen cing ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa la gzhug par bya zhes bstan pa'i don du dgongs pa yod pas na bzhengs pa yin no //
translated: In order to demonstrate that he abides in equipoise not under the sway of other afflictions, and in order to demonstrate that he knows what is possible and impossible and will engage in what is proper, he has the intention to arise.

original: de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnang pa nod pa dang gnas kyi nges pa'i don du de ltar gsol ba 'debs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnang pa nod pa dang gnas kyi nges pa'i don du de ltar gsol ba 'debs par byed pa yin no //
translated: The phrase those and so forth is the supplication for the bestowal of permission and the ascertainment of the site.

original: aom satva aushn'i sha phat ces bya ba'i snying po 'dis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de la bka' stsal nas srung bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: aom satva aushn'i sha phat ces bya ba'i snying po 'dis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de la bka' stsal nas srung bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The Blessed One Vairocana, with the essence Om, I will protect!

original: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Those who wish to practice the gateway of mantra, in order to abandon the afflictions and secondary afflictions,

original: bdag nyid srung ba byas la 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo thams cad la bka' bsgo ba bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid srung ba byas la 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo thams cad la bka' bsgo ba bya'o //
translated: should protect themselves and command all worldly wheels.

original: de lta ma yin na 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo de dag 'tshe bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo de dag 'tshe bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, those worldly wheels will cause harm.

original: de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni de ma thag kho nar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor rnams las dngos su'o ;
analyzed: de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni de ma thag kho nar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor rnams las dngos su'o ;
translated: Then, as soon as this was said, means that at that very moment, from the uṣṇīṣas of all the tathāgatas, such as Vairocana, equal to the number of atoms in all world systems, they became the light rays of many colors.

original: / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //🔽kha dog du ma'i 'od zer du 'gyur te //
analyzed: / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o // kha dog du ma'i 'od zer du 'gyur te //
translated: The Blessed One Vajrapāṇi himself is the great vajra holder who abides in the hearts of all tathāgatas.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang dkar po'i kha dog gi 'od zer du gyur nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang dkar po'i kha dog gi 'od zer du gyur nas /
translated: They became the light rays of many colors means that they became the light rays of blue, yellow, red, green, and white colors.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ji skad bshad pa'i gtsug tor nas byung nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ji skad bshad pa'i gtsug tor nas byung nas /
translated: Having emerged from the uṣṇīṣas of all tathāgatas as explained,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas yang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas yang /
translated: they illuminated all world systems and again

original: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gtsug gi mtshams kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyi ngo bor gyur te gnas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gtsug gi mtshams kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyi ngo bor gyur te gnas so //
translated: It became the essence of the form of the great being's mark on the crown of the Blessed Vajrapāṇi's head.🔽Then from that mass of splendor

original: de nas gzi brjid kyi phung po de las @327b zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor ro //
analyzed: de nas gzi brjid kyi phung po de las @327b zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor ro //
translated: The Blessed One's uṣṇīṣa is Vajrasattva's uṣṇīṣa.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas 'di byung ngo zhes bya ba ni nges par phyung ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas 'di byung ngo zhes bya ba ni nges par phyung ba'o //
translated: It came forth from the uṣṇīṣas of all the Tathāgatas means it was definitely emitted.

original: yang 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: yang 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is also taught:

original: sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis bdag nyid srung ba byas la /
analyzed: sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis bdag nyid srung ba byas la /
translated: Having protected oneself with the Bodhisattva's uṣṇīṣa,

original: yang 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i phyag gis gtsug tor gzi brjid kyi phung po bsgrubs la gzhag par bya ste phyis 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo la bka' bsgo ba bya'o //
analyzed: yang 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i phyag gis gtsug tor gzi brjid kyi phung po bsgrubs la gzhag par bya ste phyis 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo la bka' bsgo ba bya'o //
translated: one should again accomplish and place the uṣṇīṣa splendor mass with the blazing wheel hand, and later give instructions to the worldly wheel.

original: de ltar rdo rje sems dpas gtsug tor dang gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya dang sngags dag gis bdag nyid srung ba byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje sems dpas gtsug tor dang gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya dang sngags dag gis bdag nyid srung ba byas nas /
translated: Thus, having protected oneself with the uṣṇīṣa and splendor mass mudrā and mantra of Vajrasattva,

original: da ni de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: da ni de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Now, from “Then the great bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi spoke this his own mantra” up to

original: aom badzra sa ma ya karma sa dha ya krita /
analyzed: aom badzra sa ma ya karma sa dha ya krita /
translated: oṃ vajra samaya karma siddhya kṛta

original: 'di zhes bya ba'i bar du 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams sprul pa bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba'i bar du 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams sprul pa bshad pa yin no //
translated: “this” explains the emanation of the deities of the worldly great maṇḍala of the wheel.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba nas /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba nas /
translated: Then, from “Then the blessed one, all tathāgatas” up to

original: sa da krita ces bya ba'i bar du 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa bstan pa yin na //
analyzed: sa da krita ces bya ba'i bar du 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa bstan pa yin na //
translated: “saṭ kṛt” explains the second samādhi called the “supreme king of the maṇḍala of the great three-worlds wheel.”

original: de nas bsdu ba byas la byin gyis brlabs pa nas brtsams pa ni /
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba byas la byin gyis brlabs pa nas brtsams pa ni /
translated: Then, having gathered, from the consecration and so forth,

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo chen po'i las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i tshul du 'dir yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo chen po'i las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i tshul du 'dir yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The third concentration, called the supreme activity of the great wheel of the three worlds, should be understood here in the same way as it is explained in the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm.

original: 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas de las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas de las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the great maṇḍala of the worldly wheel, having obtained the samaya and empowerment, one should accomplish the siddhis explained in that [maṇḍala].

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Then, from Then the Blessed One Vajrapāṇi... and so forth, the extensive ritual of the master's actions and the ritual of inducting the disciples is taught.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa ste /
translated: Then means at that time.

original: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
translated: All vajra families means both worldly and transcendent.

original: de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo phyag rgya chen po'i gtso bor gyur pa 'di bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo phyag rgya chen po'i gtso bor gyur pa 'di bstan pa'o //
translated: The mandala of those is this Great Seal of the Wheel of the Three Worlds, which is taught as the principal one.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: Then is immediately after.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor chen po bsgom pa'i mtshan ma thob pa de'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor chen po bsgom pa'i mtshan ma thob pa de'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
translated: It is immediately after the attainment of the sign of the meditation of the Great Mandala of the Three Worlds.

original: de nas ni rgyu de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don @328a * //
analyzed: de nas ni rgyu de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don @328a * //
translated: Then is for that reason, that is the meaning.

original: to ; / gang gi phyir 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa med na des 'dul pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams de las bshad pa'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir rab tu bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: to ; / gang gi phyir 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa med na des 'dul pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams de las bshad pa'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir rab tu bshad par bya'o //
translated: Because if there is no entry into the Great Mandala of the Wheel of the Three Worlds, then the realm of sentient beings to be tamed by that will not become the powers taught in that. Therefore, it should be fully explained.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste //
translated: The supreme Great Mandala

original: chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba ni //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba ni //
translated: is like the wheel of Dharma.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre //
translated: All mandalas are measured with a string.

original: zhes bya ba ni zlum por ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zlum por ro //
translated: This is circular.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yang //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yang //
translated: In the center of the mandala,

original: seng ldeng phur bu btab nas ni //
analyzed: seng ldeng phur bu btab nas ni //
translated: having planted a stick of khadira wood,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mkhas pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mkhas pas so //
translated: Thus, and so forth, is the procedure of the wise.

original: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarbba baghn'im bandha bam h'um phat ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarbba baghn'im bandha bam h'um phat ces bya ba ni /
translated: Oṃ vajra-kīlikīlaya sarva-bhāva praveśaya vajra-kīlaya hūṃ phaṭ.

original: sngags 'dis steng rdo rje rtse lnga pa lta bu 'og rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu seng ldeng gi phur bu la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
analyzed: sngags 'dis steng rdo rje rtse lnga pa lta bu 'og rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu seng ldeng gi phur bu la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
translated: With this mantra, one should recite one hundred and eight times a stake of cutch wood, the upper part like a five-pronged vajra and the lower part like a single-pronged vajra.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gdab par bya'o //🔽tshon sna lnga'i skud pa phur bu la nyis ldab tu byas la btags te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gdab par bya'o // tshon sna lnga'i skud pa phur bu la nyis ldab tu byas la btags te /
translated: One should drive it into the center of the maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi srad bu bre bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi srad bu bre bar bya'o //
translated: One should double the five-colored thread around the stake and use it to measure the thread for all the maṇḍalas.🔽Endowed with four threads,

original: srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa dang / zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo byas nas phyogs dang mtshams kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa dang / zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo byas nas phyogs dang mtshams kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: having made the wheel, one should lay down the thread in the directions and subdirections.

original: de yi phyi rol byung nas ni //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de yi phyi rol byung nas ni // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having come out from that,

analyzed: phyi rol gyi rim pa la thig skud nyis 'gyur du bya'o //
translated: one should double the thread for the outer perimeter.

original: dkyil 'khor gsum pa la thig skud sum 'gyur gyis thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gsum pa la thig skud sum 'gyur gyis thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: For the third maṇḍala, one should lay down the thread with a triple thread.

original: phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs tshul du //
analyzed: phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs tshul du //
translated: The directions are the spokes of the wheel.

original: grva yi ri mo srad bu bre //
analyzed: grva yi ri mo srad bu bre //
translated: The corners are lines, like a thread.

original: zhes bya ba ni mtshams rnams su ri mo bzhi rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mtshams rnams su ri mo bzhi rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu bya'o //
translated: This means that in the directions one should make four lines like a single-pointed vajra.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur gyi tshad las lhag pa'i tshon sna lnga'i srad bu seng ldeng gi phur pa la btags te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur gyi tshad las lhag pa'i tshon sna lnga'i srad bu seng ldeng gi phur pa la btags te /
translated: The five-colored thread should be made from a cord that is twice the size of the maṇḍala, tied to a peg of khadira wood.

original: gal te dkyil 'khor thams cad la khru bcu gnyis kyi tshad yod na de las khru de'i tshad kyi thig skud kyis dbus ma'i thig gdab par bya'o //

translated: If all the maṇḍalas are twelve cubits in size, then with a thread the size of a cubit, one should lay out the center line.

original: gnyis pa la khru bzhi'i tshad dang / gsum pa la khru drug gi tshad dang / de ltar dkyil 'khor cha mnyam pa'i rim pa gsum la rim pa re re zhing sgo bzhi bzhi yod par thig gdab par bya'o ;

translated: On the second, four cubits; on the third, six cubits; in that way, in the three stages of the equal parts of the maṇḍala, in each stage there are four doors.

original: / de nas khro bo'i lta bas snga ma bzhin du sgo rnams phye la /
analyzed: / de nas khro bo'i lta bas snga ma bzhin du sgo rnams phye la /
translated: Then, with the gaze of wrath, one should open the doors, as before.

analyzed: de nas srad bu bres pa der dag pa'i tshon gyis dgang bar bya zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad ma thag pa'i cho gas thig gdab par bya ste / aom badzra r'a ga sa @328b ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i tshon gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas dkar po la sogs pa kha dog re re zhing sngags lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas kha
translated: One should lay out the lines in the great maṇḍala of the Wheel of the Three Worlds with the previously explained ritual.

analyzed: dog rnam pa lngas dgang bar bya'o //
translated: With the mantra Oṃ vajra rāgasaṃmaya hūṃ, one should fill the maṇḍala with the five colors, white and so forth, each one consecrated seven times with the mantra, together with the seal of the colors explained in the great maṇḍala of the Wheel of the Three Worlds.

original: thog mar ji ltar brtsam par bya ba yin zhe na //🔽g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur ches //
analyzed: thog mar ji ltar brtsam par bya ba yin zhe na // g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur ches //

analyzed: cho ga bzhin du gzung bar bya //

analyzed: dang po bris nas zhes bya ba ni /

translated: Then, the vajra master,

analyzed: mnyam par bzhag la dbus 'dug nas // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: seated in the center in equipoise,

original: de la de nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la de nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: There, then means

original: tshon sna lngas so so zhing yang dkyil 'khor bri ba ni /🔽rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: tshon sna lngas so so zhing yang dkyil 'khor bri ba ni / rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
translated: that one should draw the maṇḍala with the five colors in each place,🔽from Vairocana up to

analyzed: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi gnas rnams su bri bar bya'o //
translated: Vajra Acala.

analyzed: snga ma bzhin du khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgyas zhugs te /
translated: Having entered with the mudrā of the wrathful Tīrntri,

analyzed: ces brjod pas sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnams dbye bar bya'o //

original: de ltar nye bar mtshon pa'i tshig bstan nas da ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bri bar bya'o zhes rnam par 'grel pa ni /🔽gser ram yang na dngul yang rung /

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /

analyzed: de'i khung bu dri zhim po dang bcas pa'i tshon sna lngas bkang la /

analyzed: aom sarba bid ces brjod do //

analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa yang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis ;

analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po bya'o //

analyzed: de nas ji lta ba'i rdo rje gzungs kyi phyag rgyas 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs te /

analyzed: bya ba thams cad bya'o zhes bya ba de ji lta ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: Then,

analyzed: bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la /

analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas nas /

analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de rdo rje go chas srung ba rnams yang dag par bsrungs la /

analyzed: dgug pa la sogs pa'i las gang yin pa de ni dgug pa la sogs pa de byed pa'o // rdo rje @330a * //
