translated: Generate that!🔽 Therefore, you should not speak of this to anyone! Because by speaking of this to one who does not know the pledge, he will fall into the hells, and will die an untimely death.

original: khyod kyis dam tshig mi shes pa su la 'ang ma smra shig ces bya'o //
analyzed: khyod kyis dam tshig mi shes pa su la 'ang ma smra shig ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, you should not speak of this to anyone who does not know the pledge.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: mthe chung mthe bo sbrel ba dang // lag gnyis bla dang 'og tu btang //
analyzed: mthe chung mthe bo sbrel ba dang // lag gnyis bla dang 'og tu btang //
translated: The little finger and the thumb are joined, and the two hands are extended above and below.

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa kha thur du bstan la mdun du thad kar brkyang ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa kha thur du bstan la mdun du thad kar brkyang ste /
translated: This means that the left hand is turned downward and extended straight forward.

original: de'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa de bzhin du brkyang ste bkan nas /
analyzed: de'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa de bzhin du brkyang ste bkan nas /
translated: The right hand is extended in the same way above it and is extended straight.

original: g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung gis g-yas pa'i mthe bo dang g-yas pa'i mthe bos g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung dang lu gu rgyud ltar sbrel ba yang g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung gis g-yon pa'i mthe bo dang / g-yon pa'i mthe bos g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud ltar sbrel bar byas nas /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung gis g-yas pa'i mthe bo dang g-yas pa'i mthe bos g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung dang lu gu rgyud ltar sbrel ba yang g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung gis g-yon pa'i mthe bo dang / g-yon pa'i mthe bos g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud ltar sbrel bar byas nas /
translated: The little finger of the left is joined to the thumb of the right, and the thumb of the left is joined to the little finger of the right, like a chain.

original: lhag ma sor mo gsum pa rdo rje rtse mo gsum pa ltar byas pa 'di ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i'o //
analyzed: lhag ma sor mo gsum pa rdo rje rtse mo gsum pa ltar byas pa 'di ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i'o //
translated: The remaining three fingers are like three vajra points. This is the mudra of Vajradhara.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Then,

original: dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i rjes thogs la //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i rjes thogs la //
translated: after the maṇḍala is explained,

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: this is the meaning.

original: gnas skabs 'dir dbang bskur ba mi srid pas /
analyzed: gnas skabs 'dir dbang bskur ba mi srid pas /
translated: Since it is impossible to confer initiation at this stage,

original: phyi rol gyi bum pa'i dbang bskur ba gang yin pa de yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya sngon du 'gro ba yin gyi phyi nas ni ma yin pas so //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi bum pa'i dbang bskur ba gang yin pa de yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya sngon du 'gro ba yin gyi phyi nas ni ma yin pas so //
translated: that which is the conferral of the vase initiation externally is preceded by the seal of the vajra-holder, but not externally.

original: de bas na gdong g-yogs bcings pa'i rjes thogs la 'jug par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas na gdong g-yogs bcings pa'i rjes thogs la 'jug par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is immediately after the blindfold is tied.

original: de la thog mar re zhig slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa na /
analyzed: de la thog mar re zhig slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa na /
translated: In that regard, first of all, when the disciple enters the maṇḍala,

original: slob dpon la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: he should say this to the master:

original: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
analyzed: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
translated: “Great joy, you, my teacher,

original: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //🔽byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
analyzed: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol // byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
translated: you, master, please consider me.🔽I seek the great protector

original: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //🔽dam tshig dag kyang bdag la stsol //
analyzed: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo // dam tshig dag kyang bdag la stsol //
translated: who reveals the way of the great enlightenment.🔽Please grant me the samayas

original: sdom pa dag kyang bdag la stsol //
analyzed: sdom pa dag kyang bdag la stsol //
translated: and also grant me the vows.🔽Please grant me the three refuges

original: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //🔽skyabs gsum po yang bdag la stsol //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te // skyabs gsum po yang bdag la stsol //
translated: of the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha.

original: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
analyzed: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
translated: In the supreme city of great liberation,

original: mgon po bdag ni gzhug bar @330b mdzod ;🔽/ ces brjod du bcug la /
analyzed: mgon po bdag ni gzhug bar @330b mdzod ; / ces brjod du bcug la /
translated: Lord, induct me!

original: de'i rjes thogs la gsol ba 'debs pa de rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byin la /
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs la gsol ba 'debs pa de rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byin la /
translated: Then, after that, having given the generation of the Thought of Enlightenment and the going for refuge to the Three [Jewels] to those who have made the supplication,

original: gdong g-yogs bcing ba byas nas /
analyzed: gdong g-yogs bcing ba byas nas /
translated: bind the blindfold.

original: de nas gzhug pa byas te /
analyzed: de nas gzhug pa byas te /
translated: Then, having inducted [them],

original: aom pra be sha ya badzra pra be sha ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po 'dis kyang zhugs so //
analyzed: aom pra be sha ya badzra pra be sha ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po 'dis kyang zhugs so //
translated: with this essence, Om, be opened, be opened, vajra, be opened!

original: de nas snying po 'dis me tog gtor ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas snying po 'dis me tog gtor ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Then, scatter flowers with this essence:

original: aom pra t'itstsha aa dhi tishtha badzra ho /
analyzed: aom pra t'itstsha aa dhi tishtha badzra ho /
translated: Om, be confirmed, be confirmed, vajra, be confirmed!

original: de nas phreng ba bcing ba byas te /
analyzed: de nas phreng ba bcing ba byas te /
translated: Then, having bound the garland,

original: aom pra ti gri hna dang ai mam satva ma h'a ba la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom pra ti gri hna dang ai mam satva ma h'a ba la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Om, accept, accept, my great gem!

original: de nas gdong g-yogs bcings pa ji lta ba bzhin du bcings pa de bzhin du bkrol nas /
analyzed: de nas gdong g-yogs bcings pa ji lta ba bzhin du bcings pa de bzhin du bkrol nas /
translated: Then, having untied the blindfold just as it was tied,

original: rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du /
translated: from the vajra hook up to Vairochana,

original: dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin du bstan te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin du bstan te /
translated: The maṇḍala is taught in stages.

original: lha gang yin pa de ni de la mi bstan te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lha gang yin pa de ni de la mi bstan te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not show to anyone the deity that is [one’s] own.

original: lha rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: lha rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of the deities?

original: lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: The reality of the deities should not be taught.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams nas /
translated: Beginning with the vajra hook,

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du gzugs brnyan tsam zhig bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du gzugs brnyan tsam zhig bstan par bya'o //
translated: up to Vairocana, one should show only the reflection.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir /
translated: Why is that?

original: gzugs brnyan tsam zhig ston la /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan tsam zhig ston la /
translated: One should show only the reflection,

original: lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid mi ston zhe na /
analyzed: lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid mi ston zhe na /
translated: but not the reality of the deities?

original: sems can log par lta ba dag kyang yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sems can log par lta ba dag kyang yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: There are sentient beings with wrong views, and so on.

original: gang gi phyir de dag kyang yod de zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de dag kyang yod de zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because they exist,

original: yang dag par bdog pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par bdog pa'o //
translated: they are truly possessed.

original: sems can ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: sems can ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of sentient beings?

original: log par lta ba can no //
analyzed: log par lta ba can no //
translated: Those with wrong views.

original: gang zhig dad pa med pa la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis /
analyzed: gang zhig dad pa med pa la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis /
translated: To those who lack faith, the Blessed One Vajra Hūṃkara

original: aom sum bha ni sum bha dh'um /🔽gri hna gri hna h'um /
analyzed: aom sum bha ni sum bha dh'um / gri hna gri hna h'um /
translated: Oṃ, sumbha ni sumbha, dhuṃ🔽gṛhṇa gṛhṇa hūṃ

original: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
analyzed: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
translated: gṛhṇāpaya gṛhṇāpaya hūṃ

original: a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na badzra h'um phat /
analyzed: a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na badzra h'um phat /
translated: ānayaho bhagavān vajra hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung nas /
analyzed: ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung nas /
translated: By reciting this, all tathāgatas emerge from the heart.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin rgya mtsho thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ji snyed pa byin gyis brlabs te bkug nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin rgya mtsho thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ji snyed pa byin gyis brlabs te bkug nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen
translated: Blessing all tathāgatas in all the cloud-oceans of the infinite world systems, together with the maṇḍalas of bodhisattvas, they are summoned and enter the great maṇḍala of the wheel of total victory over the three worlds.

original: por gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcing ba dang / rang gi ye shes la nges par sbyor ba zhes bya ba des so sor spong bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten pas /🔽rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid bstan @331a * //
analyzed: por gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcing ba dang / rang gi ye shes la nges par sbyor ba zhes bya ba des so sor spong bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten pas / rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid bstan @331a * //
translated: By binding them with the samaya and definitely uniting them with one’s gnosis, they are individually expelled by the mundane vajra-hūṃ-kāra and so on.

original: par mi bya bas so //
analyzed: par mi bya bas so //
translated: Therefore, the reality of those deities should not be taught.

original: da ni spong ba de dag 'dir bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni spong ba de dag 'dir bstan par bya'o //
translated: Now, those rejections are to be taught here.

original: gang dag ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: gang dag ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Those who say, “The knowledge of the Blessed Buddhas is not certain,” and so on,

original: de ltar khas blangs par gyur pa ci zhig spong zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar khas blangs par gyur pa ci zhig spong zhe na /
translated: what is it that they have accepted?

original: gdon mi za bar yod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes su mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar yod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes su mi 'gyur te /
translated: The knowledge of the Blessed Buddhas is not certain,

original: gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is dependent on others.

original: ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said, “Just as Vajrapāṇi was consecrated in the lineage of the Tathāgatas.”

original: ji ltar khyed kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs nas /
analyzed: ji ltar khyed kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs nas /
translated: Just as you have said that the Blessed One Vajra Hūṃkāra was consecrated

original: 'jig rten gsum gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bcug cing dbang bskur dgos par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bcug cing dbang bskur dgos par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: by the Tathāgata, and must be placed in the great maṇḍala of the three worlds and consecrated.

original: ci 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes su gyur te /
analyzed: ci 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes su gyur te /
translated: How is it that the wisdom of the Lord Buddhas is not like that?

original: mi 'gyur ba dang / gdon mi za ba'i ye shes su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhengs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba dang / gdon mi za ba'i ye shes su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhengs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the Tathagatas arise with wisdom that is unchanging and infallible.

original: di'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: di'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, he says, “the Tathagata-ness.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi ye shes ni thun mong ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi ye shes ni thun mong ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The wisdom of the Tathagata-ness is the uncommon, the meaning of which is “the commitment of the Tathagata.”

original: de'i phyir phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur bar mi 'gyur ba dang / spong bar 'gyur ro snyam pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur bar mi 'gyur ba dang / spong bar 'gyur ro snyam pa de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, Vajrapani thinks, “I will not be empowered and will be abandoned.”

original: lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, “the reality of the gods should not be taught.”

original: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni spong ba'i tshig gi don to //
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni spong ba'i tshig gi don to //
translated: “Otherwise” means the meaning of the word “abandonment.”

original: lha gang dag la dad pa zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa nas ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa'i lha gang dag la dad pa de dag la mna'i snying po byin nas /
analyzed: lha gang dag la dad pa zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa nas ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa'i lha gang dag la dad pa de dag la mna'i snying po byin nas /
translated: Those who have faith in any deity means those who have faith in any deity from the Bhagavat Vajrahūṃkara up to the end of the maṇḍala of the mātṛs.

original: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa la de kho na nyid bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa la de kho na nyid bstan par bya'o //
translated: Those who have faith in any deity means that one should give the essence of the pledge to those who have faith in any deity, from the Blessed One Vajra Humkara up to the end of the mandala of the Mothers, and one should teach them the reality of Sri Vajra Humkara and so forth.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i theg par mos pa dang / theg pa chen mos pa'i mdo sde pa gang yin pa de dag rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid chen po mi shes pas dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i theg par mos pa dang / theg pa chen mos pa'i mdo sde pa gang yin pa de dag rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid chen po mi shes pas dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: Those who are devoted to the vehicles of the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas, and those who are devoted to the Mahayana but are Sautrantikas, because they do not know the greatness of the nature of Great Vajradhara, should not be admitted into the mandala and taught.

original: 'jug par mos pa gang yin pa de dag ni gzhug par bya zhing lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyang bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jug par mos pa gang yin pa de dag ni gzhug par bya zhing lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyang bstan par bya'o //
translated: Those who are devoted to entering should be admitted and taught the reality of the deities.

original: de nas rdo rje rin po ches mtshan pa'i phreng bas dbang bskur nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje rin po ches mtshan pa'i phreng bas dbang bskur nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Then, having empowered them with a rosary marked with vajra jewels, one should teach them the reality of Sri Vajra Dharma.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par @331b rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i chogs rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya khro bo ti r'tniri'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du slob ma'i snying gar tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas bkrol la chu'i dbang bskur ba
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par @331b rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i chogs rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya khro bo ti r'tniri'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du slob ma'i snying gar tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas bkrol la chu'i dbang bskur ba
translated: One should consecrate the disciples in the manner explained in the great mandala of the Vajradhātu, or in the manner explained in the great mandala of the Three Worlds Vanquished, with the mudra of the wrathful Tiranirī, the mudra of Vajradhara explained in the great mandala of the Three Worlds Vanquished, by releasing at the disciple's heart with Tiṣṭha vajra and so forth, and bestowing the water empowerment.

original: dang / rdo rje byings su bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur bas slob ma dbang bskur la /
analyzed: dang / rdo rje byings su bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur bas slob ma dbang bskur la /
translated: And with the empowerment of the vajra jewel explained in the Vajra Family, one should consecrate the disciples.

original: rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i dbang bskur te /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i dbang bskur te /
translated: One should bestow the empowerment of the three-pointed vajra.

original: de nas ming gi dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: de nas ming gi dbang bskur ro //
translated: Then one should bestow the name empowerment.

original: ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How should one do it?

original: ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said, As in the great mandala of the Vajra Commitment.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means one should do it as in the great mandala of the Three Worlds Vanquished.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i chogs /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i chogs /
translated: The ritual is taught in the great mandala of the Triumph in the Three Worlds.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la de las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo de'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la bsdu ba byas te /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la de las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo de'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la bsdu ba byas te /
translated: One should perform the yoga of Vajra Humkara as taught there, and having meditated on the three samadhis of the Wheel of the Three Worlds, one should perform the gathering.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
translated: One should seal with the four seals of all the wheels of the three worlds, confer initiation just as it is, and make perfect offerings.

original: zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam lo gcig gi bar du rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas la /
analyzed: zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam lo gcig gi bar du rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas la /
translated: One should perform the meditation and repetition of Vajra Humkara for one month, or six months, or one year.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor bris te /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor bris te /
translated: Then one should draw the mandala,

original: rang nyid dbang bskur nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: rang nyid dbang bskur nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
translated: and having conferred initiation on oneself, one should admit the disciples.

original: de la thog mar re zhig slob ma ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par gnas pa byas la /
analyzed: de la thog mar re zhig slob ma ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par gnas pa byas la /
translated: To that end, first one should perform the preparatory rite for the disciples just as it is.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa phyag bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du byed du bcug la /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa phyag bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du byed du bcug la /
translated: Then, in order to consecrate Vajra Humkara, one should cause the disciples to take up the four-seal Vajra Humkara just as it is.

original: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te /
translated: Then, one should confer initiation with the water from the vase that is located outside, consecrated by Vajra Humkara.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad du de byin gyis brlabs la /🔽rang nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba dad /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad du de byin gyis brlabs la / rang nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba dad /
translated: One should consecrate that with Vajra Humkara.

original: slob ma yang snying po 'dis bcing ngo //
analyzed: slob ma yang snying po 'dis bcing ngo //
translated: One should bind the action seal of Vajradhara oneself and bind the disciple with this essence mantra.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dha ra gri hna gri hna bandha sa ma ya h'um /🔽zhes bya ba dang / de nas phyag rgya 'di dang me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dha ra gri hna gri hna bandha sa ma ya h'um / zhes bya ba dang / de nas phyag rgya 'di dang me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
translated: Om, all tathagatas, take up the vajra, take up the vajra, bind, pledge, hum.

original: dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs la shar phyogs kye sgo nas /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs la shar phyogs kye sgo nas /
translated: Then, one should take up this seal and the flower garland and enter into the great mandala through the eastern door.

original: aom pra be sha ya badzra pra be sha ya /
analyzed: aom pra be sha ya badzra pra be sha ya /
translated: Om, open, open the vajra, open the vajra,🔽enter, enter the vajra, enter the vajra,

original: badzra a'a be sha ya badzra aa dhi tishtha h'um /
analyzed: badzra a'a be sha ya badzra aa dhi tishtha h'um /
translated: adhere, adhere to the vajra, adhere to the vajra,

original: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dgug pa dang / de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo nas snga ma bzhin du bcug ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dgug pa dang / de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo nas snga ma bzhin du bcug ste /
translated: Then, having entered through the southern door as before,🔽with the action seal of the vajra noose, induct.

original: @332a * // rdo rje zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas gzhug pa dang / de nas nub phyogs kyi sgo nas bcug la /
analyzed: @332a * // rdo rje zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas gzhug pa dang / de nas nub phyogs kyi sgo nas bcug la /
translated: Then, having entered through the western door,🔽bind with the vajra chain.

original: rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang / de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas bcug la khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang / de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas bcug la khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du byas la /
translated: Then, having entered through the northern door, having been subdued with the action seal of the wrathful vajra subjugator,🔽then, having entered through the eastern door, say this again:

original: de nas yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas bcug la 'di skad du yang bsgos shig / deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su zhugs kyis /
analyzed: de nas yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas bcug la 'di skad du yang bsgos shig / deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su zhugs kyis /
translated: “Today you have entered the family of the tathāgatas.

original: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rigs su grub pa yang thob na / dngos grub gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rigs su grub pa yang thob na / dngos grub gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: I will cause you to attain the gnosis by which you will achieve the vajra family of all tathāgatas, let alone other powers.

original: de lta bu'i ye shes rdo rje bskyed par byas kyis khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra zhig / dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ye shes rdo rje bskyed par byas kyis khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra zhig / dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
translated: Do not speak of the great maṇḍala that you have not seen to those who have not seen it.

original: de nas rdo rje slob dpon nyid kyis khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje slob dpon nyid kyis khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then the master himself should form the mudrā of Caṇḍa­mahā­roṣaṇa and say this:

original: ngas khyod la rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya yis /
analyzed: ngas khyod la rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya yis /
translated: “I will generate the gnosis of the vajra pledge in you.🔽Do not speak of it to anyone.

original: de khyod kyis su la yang ma smra zhig mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas te /
analyzed: de khyod kyis su la yang ma smra zhig mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas te /
translated: If you do not avoid misfortune, you will die,

original: dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la mna'i snying po 'di sbyin no //
analyzed: dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la mna'i snying po 'di sbyin no //
translated: and you will fall into hell.”

original: rdo rje khro bo te r'inti ri'i phyag rgya yang ston cig / rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo te r'inti ri'i phyag rgya yang ston cig / rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
translated: This is the great vajra,

original: dam tshig 'od kyi rigs bsregs pas //
analyzed: dam tshig 'od kyi rigs bsregs pas //
translated: the flame of the pledge.

original: gal te 'das na klad pa nas//
analyzed: gal te 'das na klad pa nas//
translated: If you transgress,

original: brtsams te lus rnams 'jig par byed //
analyzed: brtsams te lus rnams 'jig par byed //
translated: it will destroy your body, beginning with your head.

original: de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon ni rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang gyen du bstan pa bcings la /
analyzed: de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon ni rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang gyen du bstan pa bcings la /
translated: Then, the vajra master himself binds the vajra-holder mudra with the palms facing down and up,

original: rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste /
analyzed: rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste /
translated: places it on the disciple's head,

original: 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: and says this:

original: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig yin gyis //
analyzed: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig yin gyis //
translated: This is your vajra pledge.

original: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you speak of it to anyone, your head will split open.

original: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i chu'i snying po lan cig bsngags la slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go //
analyzed: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i chu'i snying po lan cig bsngags la slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go //
translated: Then, with that very pledge mudra, and having enchanted the water of the ocean once with the essence mantra, the master should make the disciple drink it.

original: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
translated: The essence mantra of the ocean is this:

original: rdo rje sems dpa' der khyod kyi //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' der khyod kyi //
translated: Vajrasattva, you should

original: snying la yang dag zhugs par 'gyur ;
analyzed: snying la yang dag zhugs par 'gyur ;
translated: will enter into your heart.

original: / gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
analyzed: / gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
translated: If you speak of this method,

original: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
analyzed: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
translated: you will be split asunder immediately.

original: aom badzra au da ka tha /
analyzed: aom badzra au da ka tha /
translated: oṃ vajra-udaka tha

original: de nas slob ma la 'di skad brjod de /
analyzed: de nas slob ma la 'di skad brjod de /
translated: Then say to the disciple:

original: der phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis ngas byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
analyzed: der phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis ngas byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
translated: “From now on, I am Vajrapāṇi. You must do whatever I tell you to do.

original: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
analyzed: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not disrespect me.🔽If you do not give up what is unpleasant, you will die and fall into hell.”

original: @332b mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la 'di skad du /
analyzed: @332b mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la 'di skad du /
translated: Say this and tell him:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /🔽rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig par bsgo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la / rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig par bsgo'o //
translated: “All tathāgatas, please empower me.🔽May Vajrasattva descend upon me.”

original: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di dang / aom badzra a'a be sha aa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dbab la bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di dang / aom badzra a'a be sha aa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dbab la bskyed par bya'o //
translated: Then, with this pledge seal of vajra descent and this essence, oṃ vajra-āveśaya aḥ, cause him to descend and generate him.

original: de nas aom pra ti'tstsha aa dhi tishsta badzra ho //
analyzed: de nas aom pra ti'tstsha aa dhi tishsta badzra ho //
translated: Then, with the essence mantra “Oṃ, please be firmly present, vajra hoḥ,”

original: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o //
translated: one should cast the flower.

original: de nas aom bra ti grihna tvam mi mam stva ma h'a ba la zhes bya ba nges phreng ba blangs te /
analyzed: de nas aom bra ti grihna tvam mi mam stva ma h'a ba la zhes bya ba nges phreng ba blangs te /
translated: Then, with “Oṃ, please accept this garland, O great being,”

original: de nyid kyi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
translated: one should take the garland and place it on the head of the disciple.

original: de nas / aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
analyzed: de nas / aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
translated: Then, with “Oṃ, today Vajrasattva

original: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad /
analyzed: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad /
translated: is intent on opening your eyes.

original: rdo rje mig ni bla med pa //
analyzed: rdo rje mig ni bla med pa //
translated: The unsurpassed vajra eye🔽will be opened today itself,”

original: de ring nyid du 'byed par shog / ces bya ba 'di dang / de ltar bcings pa'i gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ring nyid du 'byed par shog / ces bya ba 'di dang / de ltar bcings pa'i gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: one should remove the blindfold that was tied over the eyes.🔽Then, with “Hevajra, behold!”

original: de nas he badzra p'a shya zhes bya bas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi mthar thug pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan to //
analyzed: de nas he badzra p'a shya zhes bya bas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi mthar thug pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan to //
translated: one should show the maṇḍala, beginning with the vajra hook up to Vairocana.

original: slob mas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya dang / tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po 'dis slob ma'i snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: slob mas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya dang / tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po 'dis slob ma'i snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: The disciple, with the gesture of the vajra-holder, should be untied at the heart with this essence, “tiṣṭha vajra,” and so forth.

original: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las /
analyzed: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las /
translated: Then, from the victorious vase,

original: rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
translated: taking water with the vajra fist,

original: aom aa bhi shinytsa badzra dha ra te sa na y'a gra gra zhes bya ba 'dis bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom aa bhi shinytsa badzra dha ra te sa na y'a gra gra zhes bya ba 'dis bskur bar bya'o //
translated: one should sprinkle with this, “oṃ abhiṣiñca vajrasatva hūṃ.”

original: de nas phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang / mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin pa ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob ma'i chog bzhin du bya'o /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang / mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin pa ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob ma'i chog bzhin du bya'o /
translated: Then, the empowerment of the seal, the empowerment of the sign, and the empowerment of the name should be given just as in the rite for the disciple in the great maṇḍala of Trailokyavijaya.

original: de ltar 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma 'jug pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas 'jig rten gsum pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par 'dod pa na slob dpon gyi phyag rgya dang snying🔽po byin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma 'jug pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas 'jig rten gsum pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par 'dod pa na slob dpon gyi phyag rgya dang snying po byin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having thus taught extensively the ritual of the master's acts in the great maṇḍala of the worldly wheel and the ritual of the acts for the disciples to enter, in order to explain the bestowal of the empowerment and the samayas of the great maṇḍala of the worldly wheel, and in order to explain that the master bestows the essence mantra to the disciples who have obtained the empowerment, [the text] states:

original: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa bslab po zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa bslab po zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Then, the binding of the great seal should be taught.

original: 'dir phyag rgya chen po 'ching ba na /
analyzed: 'dir phyag rgya chen po 'ching ba na /
translated: Here, when binding the great seal,

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: it is the samayamudrā.

original: phyag rgya @333a * //
analyzed: phyag rgya @333a * //
translated: The seal

original: chen po bcing ba yang rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa nas ma mo'i mthar thug pa rnams 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba shes par bya'o //
analyzed: chen po bcing ba yang rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa nas ma mo'i mthar thug pa rnams 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba shes par bya'o //
translated: The great binding should be known to follow the explanation in the great maṇḍala of the total victory in the three worlds, from Vairocana and Vajra Hūṃkāra up to the mātṛkās.

original: rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te //
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te //
translated: The vajra binding is promised

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: and so on.

original: rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa'i rdo rje bcings pa bsdams pa bstan par byas nas /🔽de nyid kyi mthe bo gnyis nang du bkug nas /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa'i rdo rje bcings pa bsdams pa bstan par byas nas / de nyid kyi mthe bo gnyis nang du bkug nas /
translated: Having demonstrated the vajra binding explained in the vajra realm,🔽one should bend the two thumbs inward

original: mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug la de mthe bo gnyis ka'i rgyab bkab pa ni /
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug la de mthe bo gnyis ka'i rgyab bkab pa ni /
translated: and bend the two index fingers inward, covering the backs of the two thumbs.

original: sems dpa' gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of the crest-jewel being.🔽The essence mantra is:

original: aom badzras tva aushn'i sha h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzras tva aushn'i sha h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ vajrasattva uṣṇīṣa hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ces bya ba'i snying po 'dis lha thams cad dang rnal 'byor pas ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: ces bya ba'i snying po 'dis lha thams cad dang rnal 'byor pas ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Having inserted the gnosis being with this essence mantra, all the deities and the practitioner should be empowered.

original: bdag nyid bsrung ba'i phyir rang gi gtsug tor sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid bsrung ba'i phyir rang gi gtsug tor sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: For the sake of protecting oneself, one should apply one’s own uṣṇīṣa.

original: rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni /
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni /
translated: Having made the vajra bond,🔽the index and ring fingers are extended.

original: mthe bo gung mo zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings su gsungs pa nyid kyis rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
analyzed: mthe bo gung mo zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings su gsungs pa nyid kyis rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
translated: Having bound the vajra bond as taught in the Vajra Realm,

original: mthe bo dang gung mo dang mthe'u chung rnams so sor bsgreng bar byas pa 'di ni /
analyzed: mthe bo dang gung mo dang mthe'u chung rnams so sor bsgreng bar byas pa 'di ni /
translated: the index, middle, and ring fingers are extended individually.

original: gzi brjed phung bo'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: gzi brjed phung bo'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: This is the mudra of Tejorāśi.

original: aom na ma:sarbba ta tha ga to shn'i sha te dzo aa ba lo gi te ma'u rta h'um phat /
analyzed: aom na ma:sarbba ta tha ga to shn'i sha te dzo aa ba lo gi te ma'u rta h'um phat /
translated: The mantra is: “Oṃ, homage to all tathāgatas, the blazing light, the garland of light, the light of the mind, hūṃ phaṭ.”

original: ces bya ba'i sngags 'dis spyi gtsug gi steng du gzi brjed phung po'i 'khor lo'i lag pa 'di bzhag pas /
analyzed: ces bya ba'i sngags 'dis spyi gtsug gi steng du gzi brjed phung po'i 'khor lo'i lag pa 'di bzhag pas /
translated: With this mantra, one should place this hand, the wheel of Tejorāśi, above the crown of one’s head.

original: sgrub pa bos dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bsgoms la 'di bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa bos dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bsgoms la 'di bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Visualizing the accomplishment of the great siddhi of the practitioner, one should accomplish this.

original: gang gi rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor bsgrub par bdag nyid sbyor ba yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor bsgrub par bdag nyid sbyor ba yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: When one is applying oneself to the accomplishment of the uṣṇīṣa of Vajrasattva,

original: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas pa sku mdog sngon po g-yon pa'i khro po'i khu tshur gyis snying gar sdigs mdzub byed pa /
analyzed: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas pa sku mdog sngon po g-yon pa'i khro po'i khu tshur gyis snying gar sdigs mdzub byed pa /
translated: He stands in the posture of left leg extended, his body blue, his left hand in an angry fist at his heart making a threatening gesture,

original: de las gzhan pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje rtse lnga pa spyi gtsug tu 'phangs nas 'dzin cing gnas par bdag nyid bsgoms la /

analyzed: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis kha'i phyogs su bskor ba 'di ni rdo rje ser skya'i'o //

analyzed: / ces bya ba ni g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyon pa'i mthe bo'i steng du gzhag pa ni rdo rje glang sna'i'o //

original: phreng ba 'ching ba'i thabs su sbyar //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phreng ba 'ching ba'i thabs su sbyar // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Apply it in the method of binding a garland.

original: gyon pa'i khu tshur gyis rang gi mgo bo la phreng ba 'ching pa'i tshul du byed pa'i ni rdo rje phreng ba'i'o //🔽nor sbyin par ni g-yas pa ste /
analyzed: gyon pa'i khu tshur gyis rang gi mgo bo la phreng ba 'ching pa'i tshul du byed pa'i ni rdo rje phreng ba'i'o // nor sbyin par ni g-yas pa ste /
translated: This is the mudra of Vajra-Mala.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The right hand is for giving wealth.

original: lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur yang dang yang nor sbyin pa'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje dbang gi'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur yang dang yang nor sbyin pa'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje dbang gi'o //
translated: The gesture of the right hand, repeatedly forming the fist and the gesture of giving wealth, is the vajra-vaśitā.

original: ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog / ces bya ba ni g-yas ba'i khu tshur ral gri 'dzin pa'i tshul du byed pa ni /
analyzed: ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog / ces bya ba ni g-yas ba'i khu tshur ral gri 'dzin pa'i tshul du byed pa ni /
translated: The gesture of the sword, the supreme fist, is the right fist in the form of holding a sword.

original: rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'o //
translated: This is the vajra-vijaya.

original: g-yas pa'i mdun du gtun rings 'dzin//🔽@335a * // zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: g-yas pa'i mdun du gtun rings 'dzin// @335a * // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In front of the right, holding a plow.🔽This is the right fist in the form of holding a plow in front.

original: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis gtun rings mdun du 'dzin pa'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje gtun rings kyi'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis gtun rings mdun du 'dzin pa'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje gtun rings kyi'o //
translated: This is the vajra-hala.

original: g-yas pa brkyang ba de bzhin te //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: g-yas pa brkyang ba de bzhin te // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The right leg extended, likewise,

original: lag dar gnyis bteg ste brkyang la /
analyzed: lag dar gnyis bteg ste brkyang la /
translated: This is the two hands raised and extended,🔽in the form of holding a banner carried by the wind.

original: rlung gis khyer ba'i dar 'dzin pa'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje rlung gi'o ;🔽/ g-yas pas 'od ni bar bar bstan //
analyzed: rlung gis khyer ba'i dar 'dzin pa'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje rlung gi'o ; / g-yas pas 'od ni bar bar bstan //
translated: This is the vajra-vāyu.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The right hand shows the light in between.

original: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis brkyang nas me 'bar ba'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje me'i'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis brkyang nas me 'bar ba'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje me'i'o //
translated: The right fist extended out in the manner of a blazing fire is the vajra fire mudra.

original: rdo rje khu tshur bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur bskyod pa'o //
translated: The vajra fist is shaken.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means:

original: g-yon pa'i khu tshur bskyod cing mdun du gzhag pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i khu tshur bskyod cing mdun du gzhag pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi'o //
translated: Shaking the left fist and placing it in front is the vajra Bhairava mudra.

original: bsgyings bcas mdzub mo khar mche ba //
analyzed: bsgyings bcas mdzub mo khar mche ba //
translated: The extended index finger is the fang in the mouth.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means:

original: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar khar mche ba'i tshul du bzhag nas /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar khar mche ba'i tshul du bzhag nas /
translated: The index finger of the left fist is placed in the mouth in the manner of a fang.

original: g-yas pa'i khu tshur rked par gzhag pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i khu tshur rked par gzhag pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
translated: The right fist is placed at the waist. This is the vajra hook mudra.🔽The club is gathered and the earth is pressed down.

original: dbyig pa bsdu na zhing mnan pa dang // zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dbyig pa bsdu na zhing mnan pa dang // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means:

original: g-yon pa'i khu tshur spyi bor bzhag nas bsnun pa ltar byed pa ni rdo rje dus kyi'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i khu tshur spyi bor bzhag nas bsnun pa ltar byed pa ni rdo rje dus kyi'o //
translated: Placing the left fist on the crown, one acts as if striking. This is the vajra time mudra.🔽The arm is bent and suspended.

original: dpung pa bskum zhing dpyang ba dang // zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dpung pa bskum zhing dpyang ba dang // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means:

original: g-yon pa'i lag dar bskum la dpyang ba ltar byas pa ni /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i lag dar bskum la dpyang ba ltar byas pa ni /
translated: The left arm is bent and acts as if suspended.

original: rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'i'o //
translated: This is the chief vajra obstacle mudra.

original: g-yas pa gyon gyis 'dren pa'o //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: g-yas pa gyon gyis 'dren pa'o // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The right hand is extended.

original: gyon pa'i khu tshur gyi lag dar gyi zhags pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa ni klu rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: gyon pa'i khu tshur gyi lag dar gyi zhags pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa ni klu rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the pledge seal of the Naga-vajra.

original: au ma la sogs pa'i ma mo rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: au ma la sogs pa'i ma mo rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The pledge seals of the goddesses such as Uma will be explained in the Dhâranî-mandala of the Wheel of the Three Worlds.

original: khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad zin to //
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad zin to //
translated: The pledge seals of the wrathful vajra-hooks, etc. have already been explained in the great mandala of the Triumph over the Three Worlds.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad zin to //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad zin to //
translated: The Dharma seals of Vairochana, etc. have already been explained in the great mandala of the Triumph over the Three Worlds.

original: klu rdo rje la mthar thug pa'i 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: klu rdo rje la mthar thug pa'i 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni /
translated: The Dharma seals of all the mundane deities ending with the Naga-vajra are as follows:

original: rang gi chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i sngags rnams so //
analyzed: rang gi chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i sngags rnams so //
translated: the mantras taught in the maṇḍala of one’s own deity.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par gyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen par bshad zin to //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par gyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen par bshad zin to //
translated: The action seal of Vairocana has already been explained in the maṇḍala of the Great Victory over the Three Worlds.

original: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar dang / ma mo'i @335b tshogs kyi mthar thug pa'i 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi las kyi ji phyag rgya ni 'jig rten pa'i ;'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa de gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar dang / ma mo'i @335b tshogs kyi mthar thug pa'i 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi las kyi ji phyag rgya ni 'jig rten pa'i ;'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa de gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The action seals of the worldly deities from Śrī Vajrahūṃkāra up to Vajra-Amogha and the assembly of mātṛs should be taken from the Action Maṇḍala of the Wheel of Worldly Affairs.

original: dkyil khor kun du brtag pa ni //
analyzed: dkyil khor kun du brtag pa ni //
translated: The investigation of all maṇḍalas

original: gyon pas rdo rje bzung nas so //
analyzed: gyon pas rdo rje bzung nas so //
translated: is done by wearing the vajra-fist.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is said:

original: thig skud 'debs pa dang tshon 'dri ba'i dus su thog mar gyon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur byas la /
analyzed: thig skud 'debs pa dang tshon 'dri ba'i dus su thog mar gyon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur byas la /
translated: When laying out the chalk lines and applying the colors, first make the vajra-fist gesture while wearing the vajra.

original: phyis ci bde bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyis ci bde bar bya'o //
translated: Later, do whatever is convenient.

original: de nas rab tu bshad pa ni //
analyzed: de nas rab tu bshad pa ni //
translated: Then, the explanation

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: and so forth.

original: de ltar phyag rgya'i ye shes bslabs nas /
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya'i ye shes bslabs nas /
translated: Having thus trained in the gnosis of the seal,

original: phyag rgyab sgrub pa'i las bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: phyag rgyab sgrub pa'i las bshad par bya ste /
translated: one should explain the rite of accomplishing the seal.

original: de la / sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang //
analyzed: de la / sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang //
translated: As for “the seal of whatever hero,”

original: zhes bya ba ni /🔽rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni / rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
translated: it is as follows:🔽When one meditates on the seal of the great seal, etc.,

original: ma mo'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnam su bsgom pa na deng bdag nyid phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ma mo'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnam su bsgom pa na deng bdag nyid phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: of Vairochana, etc., up to the mother, one should meditate on oneself as having become the form of the seal.

original: phyag rgya bsgrub pa dam par 'gyur //
analyzed: phyag rgya bsgrub pa dam par 'gyur //
translated: “The accomplishment of the seal will be supreme”

original: zhes bya ba ni/'di skad ston pa yin te rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa bzhin du bsgrub pa dang /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni/'di skad ston pa yin te rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa bzhin du bsgrub pa dang /
translated: means the following: One should accomplish the great mandala of the conqueror of the three worlds just as it is explained, from Vairochana and Vajra Humkara up to Vajra Acala.

original: phyi'i rdo rje rigs rnams kyang rdo rje thal mo dang / rdo rje bsdams pa bcing ba dang de nas rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dgrol la /
analyzed: phyi'i rdo rje rigs rnams kyang rdo rje thal mo dang / rdo rje bsdams pa bcing ba dang de nas rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dgrol la /
translated: Also, the external Vajra Family should be brought down upon oneself with the vajra-folded-hands gesture, binding the vajra-binding, and then releasing the vajra-binding at the heart.

original: bdag nyid la dbab pa dang / dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid la dbab pa dang / dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should bind the pledge-vajra-fist.

original: de nas aom sum bha ni sum bha r'a dz'a bidya autta ma h'um phat /
analyzed: de nas aom sum bha ni sum bha r'a dz'a bidya autta ma h'um phat /
translated: Then, with “Oṃ, you are the king of the subduers, the supreme knowledge of subjugation, hūṃ phaṭ,”

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i snying ga'i nang du rdo rje la yid kyis bris nas /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i snying ga'i nang du rdo rje la yid kyis bris nas /
translated: and so on, one should mentally write the vajra in the heart.

original: de nyid yid kyis brjod cing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms la /
analyzed: de nyid yid kyis brjod cing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms la /
translated: Mentally reciting that, one should meditate on the selflessness of all phenomena.

original: der zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa dang / de'i steng du yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yang de dag sngags dang bcas pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: der zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa dang / de'i steng du yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yang de dag sngags dang bcas pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba'i rdo rje'o //
translated: There, in the form of a moon disc, and also on top of that, a second moon disc, from those together with the mantra, a blazing five-pronged vajra is the vajra.

original: de nyid las rdo rje rtse gsum pa la sogs pa de'i nang du snying po bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las rdo rje rtse gsum pa la sogs pa de'i nang du snying po bsam par bya'o //
translated: From that, one should imagine the essence in the middle of the three-pronged vajra and so on.

original: phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni lha yin la /
analyzed: phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni lha yin la /
translated: That mudrā is the deity,

original: lha gang yin pa de ni bdag yin no zhes bsgoms la /🔽de nas phyag rgya'i gzugs de badzra satva h'um zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: lha gang yin pa de ni bdag yin no zhes bsgoms la / de nas phyag rgya'i gzugs de badzra satva h'um zhes brjod pas /
translated: and that deity is oneself.🔽Then, having recited Vajrasattva HŪṀ,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on the form of the mudrā as Vajrasattva.

original: yang bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing 'di skad brjod do //🔽badzra stva ham zhes brjod de rdo rje @336a * //
analyzed: yang bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing 'di skad brjod do // badzra stva ham zhes brjod de rdo rje @336a * //
translated: Again, with pride, one should wave the vajra and recite this:🔽Vajrasattva HŪṀ.

original: sems dpa'o // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' de ni sum bha ni sum bha badzra bidya autta ma h'um phat /
analyzed: sems dpa'o // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' de ni sum bha ni sum bha badzra bidya autta ma h'um phat /
translated: Then, that Vajrasattva, having recited SUMBHANI SUMBHANI VAJRA VIDYA UTTA MAHĀ HŪṀ PHAṬ,

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod pas /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod pas /
translated: and so forth,

original: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid du nges par byas la /🔽ma h'a sa ma ya sa tr'a ham zhes brjod do //
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid du nges par byas la / ma h'a sa ma ya sa tr'a ham zhes brjod do //
translated: one should ascertain the nature of the form of Vajravidyottama and so forth.🔽Then, one should recite MAHĀ SAMAYA SATVA HŪṀ.

original: de nas de'i dam chig gi phyag rgya bcings la sa ma yo& ham zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de nas de'i dam chig gi phyag rgya bcings la sa ma yo& ham zhes brjod do //
translated: Then, having formed the pledge seal, one should recite SAMAYA HOḤ.

original: yang de nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam das snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor byin gyis brlabs par byas te /
analyzed: yang de nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam das snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor byin gyis brlabs par byas te /
translated: Then, with the pledge seal of that deity, firmly press on the heart, forehead, throat, and crown.

original: sa ma ya stvam tishtha sva mam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam tishtha sva mam zhes bya'o //
translated: Say, “Samaya stvaṃ tiṣṭha svam,”

original: de nas rtse gsum pa la sogs pa blangs la snying po brjod cing /
analyzed: de nas rtse gsum pa la sogs pa blangs la snying po brjod cing /
translated: and then take up the three-tined vajra, and so on, and recite the essence mantra.

original: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i dbyings su de dag gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i dbyings su de dag gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: Bless your seal as the great seal of those deities in the realm of Vajra Awareness, and so on.

original: de nas mdun du rdo rje mdung la sogs pa phab la /🔽badzra sh'u la mu dra ham zhes bya bas nga rgyal bskyed nas badzra bidy'a ma a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: de nas mdun du rdo rje mdung la sogs pa phab la / badzra sh'u la mu dra ham zhes bya bas nga rgyal bskyed nas badzra bidy'a ma a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Then, in front of you, place the vajra spear, and so on.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pas /
translated: Generate pride with “Vajra śūlamudrā haṃ,” and then recite “Vajravidyā ātmāna ko’haṃ,” and so on.

original: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i gzugs su rang gi phyag rgya de bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i gzugs su rang gi phyag rgya de bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Meditate on your seal as the form of Vajra Awareness, and so on.

original: de nas khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya sa rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te rdo rje rtse gsum pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis /
analyzed: de nas khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya sa rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te rdo rje rtse gsum pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis /
translated: Then, with the action seal of the wrathful Vajra Hook, and so forth, one should summon, induct, bind, and subdue with the nine, such as the Vajra Knowledge Queen, and with the pledge seals of the three-tined vajra, and so forth.

original: aom sum bha ni sum bha badzra bidya autta ma h'um phat dri shya zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: aom sum bha ni sum bha badzra bidya autta ma h'um phat dri shya zhes brjod cing /
translated: Reciting Oṃ suṃbhani suṃbhani vajravidyottama hūṃ phaṭ dṛśya,

original: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa bltas la /
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa bltas la /
translated: one should gaze with the Vajra Knowledge Queen, and so forth.

original: de nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / dza:h'um bam ho: zhes bya bas rang gi lus la bcug gnas sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: de nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / dza:h'um bam ho: zhes bya bas rang gi lus la bcug gnas sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas /
translated: With the pledge seal of that [Vajra Knowledge Queen], and reciting jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ, one should induct the Knowledge Being into one’s body.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la sa ma ya stvam /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la sa ma ya stvam /
translated: Reciting samayas tvaṃ, one should generate the moon mandala.

original: aa ham zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: aa ham zhes brjod pas /
translated: Reciting samaya stvaṃ aham,

original: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i gzugs dang gcig tu gyur pas bdag nyid rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
